Summary: This was a great location for Disneyland.  Just a few minutes from Downtown Disney.  Our room was huge and comfortable for our family of 5.  I would definitely stay here again.  The renovations were clean and modern.
Manager Response: Hello ollysd,  Thank you for staying with us and bringing your family.  I am very pleased that you all had such a great stay.  We look forward to seeing to guys again soon.

Summary: Yikes, I am not sure where to begin. The front desk Mike was very nice and helpful from there all hell broke loose. Checked in the first room... had an awful moldy odor and the fridge handle was jet black, room so outdated and small. Called the front desk poor Mike gave us another room and thinking that might've just been it, nah..room was moldy, smelly, carpet was ripped, shower curtains were ripped as well. To a point I was having asthma attack because of the smell. My kids couldn't fall asleep because they and us felt so disgusted. Had to check after the first night to another Hotel. After all I will not be back at the hotel ever.
Manager Response: Hello Ana B,  I want to thank you for staying with us and apologize that you did not have a good stay.  We always hope that our guests have a perfect stay and obviously, that did not happen in this case.  Please have a nice day.

Summary: Our family recently stayed here in a 2 bedroom suite. We were very pleased with the accommodations. The kitchen was well-stocked, the bedrooms were spacious, and everything was clean. The breakfast buffet was excellent as hotel food goes. Yes, you get a bit tired of eating the same things after several days but the quality and variety was very good overall. They also have an appetizer/cocktail hour M-T-W evenings. We went one night and were pleasantly surprised by how much food was available. It was basically free dinner. The buses to and from Disneyland pick up and drop off in front of the Holiday Inn right next door every half hour or so. Very convenient. There's no restaurant/bar on-site, but there is a Burger Theory at the Holiday Inn. This hotel is not really near anything
Manager Response: Hello mom2zen,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your story about your stay with us.  I appreciate all of the feedback, including where we can improve.  I will have our engineering department take a look into that A/C unit.  Thanks again, and please come and stay with us again soon.

Summary: This was our first port of call on our road trip around the U.S., stopping off at Disneyland and then onto Knotts Berry Farm, both very close to this accommodation. We were welcomed with free beers and hotdogs on the afternoon of our arrival, something I think some if not most Holiday hotels offer. The rooms were clean, the staff were friendly and we enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Hello GregOBrien,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your thoughts with us all.  I am so pleased that you all had a nice stay.  Please come back and stay with us any time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Great staff and a goog location
Summary: First my thanks to Hilda and her staff for finding my camera and my grandsons pillow are getting them home. Staff where very helpful and had all the great tips to make the Disney trip a blast. Bus to Disneyland left every 1/2 hour coming and going, the price for a 3 day pass was very reasonable, 15 to 20 minutes direct with no stops.
Manager Response: Hello Joel C,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your comments with us all.  A special BIG THANKS for recognizing Hilda and her staff for their great customer service efforts.  Please come and stay with us again soon.

Summary: After leaving the hustle and bustle of Las Vegas this place was just what we needed! Clean, tidy, relaxing. The free breakfast was a complete surprise and an added bonus. Free wifi. Free laundry. Free parking! Great front desk service . Helpful and friendly.  The walk wasn’t an issue to get to Disneyland, quick and easy to access. Close to shopping etc with a short drive . We would definitely stay here again (hopefully when we bring the kids for their first Disney adventure in a few years!)
Manager Response: Hello Michelle T,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your review with us all.  Wow, it sounds like you guys had a great time.  We cannot wait for you guys to come back and bring the kids!  Hope to see you soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: I just spent 7 nights there with 2 friends. I can't begin to tell you how much we loved our stay. At check in on Saturday afternoon April 28th the young lady and young man who were at the desk set the tone for the whole week They were exceptionally nice. Everyone we spoke with who worked there was nice.  Our room was clean and comfortable. Great kitchen space, living room pull out sleeper was (fairly) comfortable as was the king bed in the bedroom. We all loved the pillows.   The pool and hot tub area was wonderful and having extra towels stocked there was perfect. The breakfast was amazing and offered plenty of variety.   The location was perfect too. Easy to get on and off the 5 and close to shopping, dining and Disneyland. Thank you to everyone at the Staybridge Manchester
Manager Response: Hello Andy L,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your story with us all.  It sounds like you guys had a great time.  Thanks for all the kind comments about our staff and hotel.  I really hope you all will come and stay with us again soon.    Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: This place was a breath of fresh air. Our suite was modern, spotlessly clean and very comfortable. The staff at Reception were very friendly and happy to answer any questions. You can buy your tickets to Disneyland there too. It is only a 10 minute drive from the park and if you don't have a car you can use their shuttle.
Manager Response: Hello nath207,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your story with us all.  Wow...  what a great review.  Well it was certainly our pleasure having you and your family stay with us.  I really hope you all will come and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Quality Hotel at a Fair Price
Summary: The Staybridge Suites is a very good property with quality rooms, good food service (i.e. a full range breakfast for the hungry traveler). It is well-located close to Disneyland and a shuttle service with regular round trips next door at their sister hotel.
Manager Response: Hello George C,  Thank you very much for staying with us and for sharing your review with us all.  It sounds like you guys had a good stay and we certainly hope you will come back and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: the staff was extremely nice. They did everything possible to make sure we felt special and cared for. The room was spacious. This is a must stay place when at Disney. The only down side was the location for on foot travel BUT THE firework show from our room made up for that 4 fold.
Manager Response: Hello Scrotto,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your review with us all.  I really appreciate all the kind comments.  We would love to have you come stay with us again whenever you are in town.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: A simple but comfortable hotel, about 3 km from Disneyland. The rooms were excellent, neat, tidy and with kitchenette. Ideal for a family of 4. Breakfast was totally self service but adequate, as one is tempted to leave early for disneyland. The shuttle service has a scheduled stop at the hotel
Manager Response: Hello Manas T,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your thoughts with us all.  I really appreciate your detailed review, and am very pleased you had a good stay with us and I hope you will come and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We turned up early after a 13 hour flight only to find the staff here couldn’t do enough to help. Gave us our room early and made sure we had everything we needed to get over the jet lag. In our 3 week US west coast trip staying in many upper class hotels this place made them all look a bit sub standard. Thanks again guys you made our trip. Don’t forget the great breakfast every morning.
Manager Response: Hello Barns84,  Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your story.  It sounds like you and your family had a great time.  I am so glad that we were able to get you guys checked in early.  And you are right, don't forget about the wonderful breakfast.  Please come and stay with us again soon...  And bring the whole family.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed in a two bedroom suite for three nights on a recent couples trip to Disneyland. The room was huge and had plenty of room. it offer the perfect amount of privacy for two couple plus a bonus of being close by! The hotel was nice. It is starting to show its age around the edges. Aside from that it was clean and well appointed. The beds were very comfortable. The breakfast each morning was very good and there was a lot of variety to choose from.  The line for the waffle makers was long each morning, as it is a every hotel. There is no shuttle to Disneyland so we drove each day. It is probably a 10-15 minute drive to the Mickey and Friend parking structure. We would definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Hello juhoo26,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your story with us all.  I really appreciate your review, and I very happy you and your family had a good time.  Please come back and stay with us any time you are in town.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We had a suite.  Queen with the foldout couch. Nice kitchen setup with decent sized refrigerator. Beds comfortable  Sheets clean  Water pressure good Breakfast each morning had lots of options. Front desk was prompt and friendly.  Stayed March 14-18 2018  All and all a good stay for the price.
Manager Response: Hello GBVacas,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing some of the things you liked about your stay.  It sounds like you had a pretty good time.  Please come back and stay with us again whenever you come into town.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: I have several issues with this property.  When I checked in I told them I needed to pay for an upgrade and  extra night.  That is what I thought I paid- Upon check out I received another bill- the front desk lady could not explain the charges- Later on that day I had to call to inquiry about this charge _ jimmy said it was for extra night and rooms are charged upon check out- I travel a lot has never heard of this ! He even writes in other reviews about "Prepay rooms" - even when I called and inquired about booking procedure the reservation people also clarified that rooms are pre paid. So when I paid upon check in this was a very right assumption and I should not have expected and additional bill- Which took them over 3 days to hit that charge to my account.  Very shady
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer G,  Thank you for staying with us.  Even in a group, the registered guest is always responsible for all charges to the suite.  You may contact your group coordinator if your feel you paid more than the others.  Also we did have someone smoking on your floor 1 night of your stay, and for your right to clean air in a "nonsmoking Hotel", we made every effort to find out who was smoking in our property and charged them for doing so.  Have a great day.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: I loved this hotel! The rooms were clean and comfy. I totally recommend this hotel , it feels familiar and the staff is very kind and helpful. Undoubtedly you’ll spend a really good time.  If you go with kids they will be safe and happy, the hotel has a very nice pool, I went in winter but that didn’t stop me to get into it 👌🏻
Manager Response: Hello Maria Jesus A,  Thank you so much for staying with us and bringing your wonderful family.  It sounds like you guys had a great time.  And thanks so much for sharing your story with us all.  Please come again...  We can't wait to see you again.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We love staybridge suites.  We stay with them everywhere we go.  This is the first time we’ve stayed with them at Disney though.  We usually stay on harbor much closer to the park.   The walk from the staybridge is about 1 mile to downtown Disney and even further if you want to be at Disney front entrance.  You can take the monorail from downtown Disney but the monorail drops you off at tomorrow land inside Disney.  We bought art passes to take the bus, but the busses run so infrequently and you have to fold your stroller and it was a huge hassle.  All in all we won’t stay at the staybridge in Anaheim again, but it is still our favorite hotel in other locations.   Pros: hot breakfast, ample parking, clean updated rooms, comfortable beds, full kitchens.   Cons: not a convenient
Manager Response: Hello abbyjcpc,  Thank you for you review.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel! Highly recommended for Business Travel
Summary: As always, Staybridge Suites is my go-to hotel when I need a clean, functional hotel with a full kitchen. I was accommodated with an upgraded suite and it was awesome! Breakfast in the morning was varied and fresh.. A little crowded because it's, well, near Disney. Beds are comfortable, A/C works well, rooms are always clean and well maintained. My only complaint was my light on the microwave didn't work. I should have passed it to the front desk but forgot. check out is a breeze and parking is adequate. This Staybridge didn't have the free popcorn in the room though.. and could have used a larger coffee pot. The area seems pretty safe with a Holiday Inn with restaurant literally sharing the same parking lot! It's a little confusing finding it the first time, but once you know
Manager Response: Hello Jack50,  Thank you for staying with us and for giving such a detailed review.  I really appreciate all the kind comments and the feedback on where we can improve.  I apologize about the microwave light being out.  Please come and stay with us again any time you come into town.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: The Hotel is situated on a side road parallel to a highway.  It took a bit of understanding the map on the GPS to get to the hotel.  Otherwise the property is nice, pleasant and clean.   Check in was very efficient and the counter staff were exceptionally helpful.  They gave me directions and were helping to recommend restaurants and even gave me a discount coupon for a restaurant next door.  I got a one bedroom suite which was very large and came with a kitchenette.  The snacks, popcorn, tea and coffee were all complimentary.  There were two TVs, one in the living room and the other in the bedroom.  Wifi was free and very fast.    As the room was facing the road which was parallel to the highway, the room was a little noisy when the windows were opened.  Otherwise the room was
Manager Response: Hello Robin C,  Thank you for staying with us and for you detailed review.  Not only did you share with us about your stay, but other interesting facts about the area and our service as well.  Thanks again, and please come and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: This hotel was perfect for my trip to Disneyland! There is a shuttle (ART) that goes directly to Disneyland every half hour and is only about a 10 minute or less ride. (They say it goes every 30 minutes on the half hour, like 9am, 9:30am - but it was often off schedule so just head to the stop when you're ready!) The 3 day ART pass is only $14 per adult which gives you unlimited rides during the day. The pick up spot is right next to the hotel and easy to find (a 30 second walk) and the drop off spot is right at the security tent at Disneyland main entrance.    The free breakfast everyday makes this hotel totally worth it as well. Plenty of choices and lots of seating. It was super busy but we never struggled grabbing a table for breakfast. They have a variety of cold and hot
Manager Response: Hello Erika S,  Thank you so much for staying with us.  I really appreciate your detailed review of your stay with us.  I liked how you pointed out some of the great parts you liked about the hotel and about our surrounding area.  We really are a great hotel for couples and families.  Please come and stay with us again, anytime you are in town.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Went to Anaheim to attend NAMM 2018. Two bedroom/two bathroom suites are not easy to find during special events. This hotel not only fit the bill but, the price was right and the staff was friendly and accommodating. Nice pool area, full breakfast and free parking. About a 1 1/2 miles from the convention center. Definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Robertnoah,  Thank you for staying with us and for the kind comments you made about our hotel and your stay.  It sounds like you had a great time.  Please come and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Nice room.. had coffee but no coffee maker in the room... breakfast was fine .. staff was very courteous .. also no ice.. had to depend on the fridge making ice but there was none in our fridge .. Location was fine close to everything and freeways.
Manager Response: Hello ken h,  Thank you for staying with us and for your review.  I apologize if all of the amenities where not in your suite.  Please let us know next time, as we want to make sure you have everything you need for a great stay.  Thank you again, and please come and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: This is a great place to stay. 30 minute walk to Disneyland or otherwise catch a shuttle.   The staff are extremely helpful and can get you tickets to Disneyland.  The Complementary breakfast is a great way to start the day.  A good range.  This hotel is set up for families so the rooms have kitchens. There is a pool and bbq area which allows you to mix with others.  I will certainly stay again and have told friends to join us next time.
Manager Response: Hello kimigp2,  Thank you very much for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  I really appreciate all of the positive, kind comments.  It looks like you all had a great stay.  Please come and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Celebrated my 39th birthday by running the 10K Thor race at Disneyland!!! An awesome experience. The hotel is located away from the traffic surrounding the park but has an ART bus stop and the walk totally doable, if you are up for the trek! We were able to check-in early, around noonish. The staff were pleasant and excited for us to run. The morning of the race we had some nice cheering as we were in costumes. Additionally, the staff gave excellent restaurant recommendations. Loved the ice water in the lobby! The room was nice and comfortable as we had a two-bedroom suite. Overall, a nice and comfortable hotel located off the beaten path/main drag. Don't snooze on this hotel!
Manager Response: Hello Grace Marie J,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  A birthday and a 10K, wow...  you are awesome.  I also thank you for sharing your story with us all.  We are proud to be a little part of your adventure.  Please come and stay with us gain soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights in January.  I love that there is free parking and breakfast, makes a trip to Disneyland so much more cost effective!  The staff there was very pleasant.  We mixed up the breakfast time and showed up 10 minutes after it ended. The breakfast team was nice enough to pull items back out and turn machines back on for us and help us still get breakfast, so very kind of them!  The hotel room was clean and offered the essentials we needed for the stay. I liked the pool area too. A bit too chilly to swim on a 70 degree day, so the hot tub was a nice advantage.  The location is just 5 minutes from Disneyland parking.  I would definitely recommend and stay there again!
Manager Response: Hello aherbon,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thanks also for sharing your story with us all.  It sounds like you guys had a great stay.  Please come and stay with us again soon.   Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: I really enjoyed this hotel!! The breakfast was one of the best I've experienced! The hotel staff we encountered were the friendliest we've experienced and really seem to love their job.  The pool was clean and they provide pool towels as well. The bathrooms were clean although at certain times trying to make the water hot would cause the pipes to make a loud clunking noise, I did notice when I showered at 11pm (I assume most people would have showered by then) it didn't make that noise and the water was the hottest I had it during our stay.  We really enjoyed that we could get food delivered to our hotel room from outside companies. The reason I didn't give 5 stars is due to the fact that they advertise our room for 3 people however only has 1 bed the other is a pull out sofa
Manager Response: Hello Jess M,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your story.  It sounds like you guys had a pretty great stay with us.  I do apologize that the pull out sofa was not comfortable.  I will report it to Housekeeping to see if we can replace it.  Have a great day and please come and stay with us again.   Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: I was very happy to have found this hotel in Anaheim with such a good price. I had previously stayed at Staybridge San Diego and almost knew what to expect. As always, it was a nice stay, good breakfast, helpful staff and clean rooms. Location is very convenient and I would say even walking distance (about 25 minutes) to Disneyland parks. Free parking was a huge plus which enabled me to get an Uber to Disneyland in the morning and just walk back from there at night. Though you should know that the walking distance included walking alongside the highway which I would not recommend to a single person walking. The only complain that I had about this place was the low water pressure in the 7th floor. Also, the water was not heating up to hot properly and it was only warm. Aside from
Manager Response: Hello Maya2464,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your review with us all.  I really appreciate all the great comments about all the things you really liked about your stay and your loyalty to our Brand.  I also appreciate the feedback about the water pressure and temperature, and I apologize that it wasn't quite up to par.  I will have our Engineering staff look into it.  It sound like you guys really had a great time anyway, and I hope you will come and stay with us again soon.    Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Loved this 2 bedroom suite!  Spacious, clean, lots of amenities!  Beds were super comfy, bathrooms were spacious.  Kitchen had everything we needed. We had full breakfasts in the morning, and Mon-Wed evenings we had what I call full dinners and drinks!  Jimmy, the front desk manager was super nice and so accommodating!  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello SGarciaABQ,  I thank you so much for sharing the story of your stay with us all.  It looks like you all really were able to enjoy lots of our amenities.  I have to admit that I am humbled and proud that you recognized me for my service efforts.  It sounds like you guys really had a great stay, and I am pretty sure I know exactly who you guys are and I really hope to see you and your wonderful family here with us again in 2018.  It would be truly our pleasure.  Happy new year to you as well!  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Stay away from this hotel! BED BUGS!!!
Summary: My family stayed here last October 19 to 22, 2017. As soon as I got back to my country I experienced itching all over my legs extending to upper torso. I was horrified to see big red spots and the itching was so unbearable! I instantly searched online what could be the possible cause and saw similar pictures of what I have as bed bug bites! I have stayed in so many hotels all over the world and this is the first time i have experienced this. I contacted the hotel several times and said their insurance company will contact me but I’ve never heard from them. The marks of the bites are still present on my body. I am so disappointed with this hotel and the whole IHG chain! Stay away from this hotel!!!!!
Manager Response: Hello Belinda V,  I am sorry that you started experiencing irritations of some sort after you got back to your country.  For anyone reading the review, we certainly respond to any type of issues a guest have while staying with us; big or small.  Had I been contacted while at the hotel, or since then, I certainly would have spoken with you.  I hope everything turns out well for you.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We booked this hotel because it was 14 of us (7 kids) spending roughly 6 days in the anaheim area for christmas.  This is definitely a good option if you have large group of people and do not want to deal with having several hotel rooms.  9 of us ( 5 kids) and 4 adults ( all women) stayed in a 2 bed suite for 5 nights and we were comfortable.  This hotel has a seamless check in service as well.  The beds are comfortable and  I was really surprised at how clean the bathrooms were.  I love how you have the kitchen option also.  On christmas day, we barbequed using the hotel's grill for chicken and burgers and they provided us with all of the utensils that we need.  They only provide light cleaning for room service and you have to request new towels daily for water conservation
Manager Response: Hello kendrano,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your story with us all.  I really appreciate all the details in the review showing the things you liked most and where you feel  we can improve.  Good feedback is important for service improvement.  We always have lots of options for breakfast; however they are generally the same options.  We do not use powdered eggs.  Please have a great new year and come and stay with us again whenever you are in town.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We absolutely love this hotel! Our family stayed here with some friends for our Disneyland vacation. We also stayed at this hotel in Sept. of 2016 for just a family Disney trip as well. (I’m horrible at getting around to reviews obviously.) Both times we stayed in their 2 bedroom suite! I love the layout of the room, that there is a kitchen, and that it feels like home away from home! The beds are very comfortable. The hotel is clean. The breakfast is delicious, and they offer many different options! They have a great pool area, which they share with the hotel next door; so the pool and hot tub are great sizes! The ART shuttle picks up at the hotel next door also, and is a very convenient way to get to Disneyland. The staff is very friendly and accommodating! Pam at the front
Manager Response: Hello Danielle G,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thanks also for sharing your terrific story with us.  Wow...  what a great review.  I especially like the part where you recognize Pam for her wonderful customer service.  She is truly a GEM and really does care about our guests.  You also pointed out some of our other great features that you liked about our hotel, and I really hope you guys will come and stay with us again.  Return guests are like family members, coming back home.  Happy new year!  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: The breakfast was really great and also the nights we were there they had substantial snacks with wine and beer at 5.30 each evening. The staff was amazing so helpful. The fully stocked kitchenette was a huge plus also because I like to cook. The room overall was just really comfortable. 24-hour laundry was greatly appreciated by me. I would like to thank the staff for letting me park the vehicle even after checking out. I do recommend this place.
Manager Response: Hello Ishtiaque A,  Thank you very much for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thanks so much for sharing your story with us all.  It sounds like you had a great stay, and thanks for pointing out some of the things you liked most about it.  I appreciate your thanks to our staff and I accept for all of us.  Please come and stay with us again, any time you are in town.  Happy new year!  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Family friendly extended stay. Not for solo travelers
Summary: If you are looking for 2bedroom suite that can holds 3 beds for the entire family (and your furry four leg family member), look no further. The separate bedroom suites give you the shared living space and a closed door bedroom.  That being said, do expect a lot of families and smaller kids in this hotel. The elevator can be crowded and you can definitely hear screaming and running in the hall way.
Manager Response: Hello SkyTeamer,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thanks so much for the positive comments about our family and pet friendly hotel.  And I also appreciate the honesty about us being Full of kids and families all of the time.  Truly, if you are seeking silence, and solitude...  We are not the hotel for those folks...  You guys please keep coming back and bringing the whole family.  Happy New Year!  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Our daughter, husband and grandchildren had one suite and we had another.  Immaculately clean, well equipped kitchenettes and plenty of room. Amazing breakfast included which really set us up for our daily visits to Disneyland. Bus for Disneyland just a few yards down the road.  Hotel very quiet and the staff are amazing.  Beds extremely comfortable and good linens.
Manager Response: Hello eweology,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thank you so much for sharing your lovely story with us all.  It sounds like you and your family had an amazing time.  We are all so very proud to be a part of such a successful family time together.  I appreciate that you pointed out some of the things that you liked most about your stay...  Especially the part about the staff being amazing.  It was our pleasure.  I hope we see you again very soon and I wish you and your family a Christmas filled with love.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: In all my years coming to visit Anaheim, I have to say that choosing Staybridge was definitely worth the price we paid. Upon check-in, I was enthusiastically greeted by the manager (I think) who was also training a new employee. Very thorough and helpful during this process. We were traveling with a baby, and I requested a crib, which was brought up shortly after we got to our room.   We got a room at the top floor for a studio suite. Breakfast was a great offering--eggs, sausage/bacon, waffles, juice, coffee, oatmeal, muffins, fruit. We definitely ate before leaving for Disneyland parks. We didn't hear much traffic noise from outside--just the booming from the fireworks at the end of the night.   Overall, I would consider coming back to this hotel again. Traveling with a baby
Manager Response: Hello JW,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Wow, what a great review and thank you so much for telling your story.  1st, I have to say thank you for noticing our great service even during training at the front desk.  I really appreciate that recognition, and it was our pleasure to get that crib up there to you.  Secondly, we really love our families here and I always say that we love our "littlest" guests, most of all.  Please come back soon and have a wonderful Christmas filled with family and love!  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Extended family of ten Disneyland area visit
Summary: We found the Staybridge to be perfect for our group of ten.  We had three suites, a one bedroom for Grandpa and Grandma, and two two-bedroom suites for our two families of four.  The suites were great for the kids, with a nice bedroom and their own bathroom.  The free breakfast was much appreciated, with cereal, fruit, yogurt, bacon or sausages, eggs, toast, waffles, bagels, and muffins. All ten of us had no trouble finding something we liked.  There is an Anaheim Resort Transit stop right next door, ten minutes to Disneyland.  Tickets for this are available at the hotel desk.  They have a small confectionary by the desk, and there is a food market just a five minute walk away.  Also a nice restaurant next door.  Our youngest grandchildren LOVED the pool.  We would certainly
Manager Response: Hello brianapp,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Wow...  what a great review.  I am pretty sure I remember you guys and we were very happy you came together as a big family.  We are so proud to be a part of it when generations in a family come, and have a great stay, full of wonderful memories.  Please come back and stay with us soon...  And have a great holiday season ahead.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: The Ants Come Marching One by One
Summary: I have mixed feelings about this hotel.  Here are some positives:  We reserved a 2 bedroom suite and it was perfect for our family.  There was plenty of room, two bathrooms, a living room area, a kitchen.  In that aspect, it was like a home away from home.  Some other positives include: free parking, the a/c worked great, quiet in the room, close to Disneyland.  On the other hand there were some negatives.  There was free breakfast but there wasn't a whole lot to choose from and we got tired of it by the end of the week.  There aren't any safes in the room.  They only do "light housekeeping" when you stay a week.  We were told 1 day would be a full cleaning, but it didn't appear that they did a full cleaning.  We left our do not disturb sign up all week except on the day that
Manager Response: Hello PPooh72,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your review.  I would like to apologize first off, that you had ants in your suite.  I certainly hope that you let us know and that we took care of the issue immediately; you did not mention that in the review.  And I also apologize that you did not care for the Lite Touch Housekeeping service and that you got bored of the breakfast.  I do appreciate that you mentioned our family sized suites and that you would stay again in that situation.  I hope you have a great holiday season.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here recently for an event at the convention center. I booked a 2 bedroom suite (1 king bed and 2 doubles) each with their own bathroom which was very convenient for two couples. The room was clean and looked very nice. The bed was comfortable as well.   The front desk staff that checked us in was pleasant and informed us that there was free breakfast included in our stay which was a lifesaver. There is also free parking in their lot, which is first come first serve. We never had trouble finding a spot even though it looked pretty packed both nights.   Uber/Lyft costs about $5 from the hotel to convention center. It is very close by.   We would stay again if in the area.
Manager Response: Hello Jessica S,  Thank you for staying with us and sharing your story.  Thanks also for pointing out that our 2 bedroom suites have two bathrooms and that we have outdoor, complimentary parking and a wonderful complimentary, full buffet breakfast; all are super convenient.  My favorite was the mention of our caring front desk staff; we really do try hard and care about our guests.  Anyway, we hope to see you again soon and that you have lovely holidays.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: This is an astounding, family cordial lodging for a Disney trip. Awesome breakfast, free stopping, great cost for Disney carry, and the staff is super pleasant. I apppreciate Manager Jimmy Raynor! Who was charitable to try and assist by and by with an Amazon bundle that got steered to the Hotel. Place is well kept, looks great, room was constantly flawless. Will remain there next time!
Manager Response: Hello AnnaGraciano,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Wow...  what a wonderful story you shared and I thank you so much for recognizing me and my staff for our customer service.  It is truly my pleasure, and I hope to see you all again very soon, and for a long while.  I also hope you have wonderful holidays filled with love.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great for families who want a little extra room for Disneyland trips!
Summary: This was our first time staying here. We booked our package through getawaytoday. We arrived early so they took our luggage and we headed to the park on the ART shuttle which you catch right next door. I like that this shuttle only services these 2 hotels. Super convenient and comes every 20 minutes. We had a suite with a king room/bathroom and a 2 full size beds/bathroom and a living kitchen area with a pullout sofa bed. The reservation was for 6 of us and was perfect!  I also really like the hot breakfast buffet that included hot/cold cereals, milk, coffee, juices, sodas, yogurt, 2-3 fruits, hard boiled eggs, cottage cheese, breads, muffins, scrambled eggs, potatoes, sausage or bacon, waffles (regular and pumpkin spice).  Jimmy at the desk was very helpful and so was Pam. We

We made a reservation with Staybridge Suites two months early, for a medical appointment in Fullerton. The medical appointment was cancelled by the Dr, so we attempted to cancel our hotel reservation 5 days in advance. They cancelled for us, but then informed us that we would still be charged for the room, full charge. If you book here, beware, they will not make concessions or exceptions.
Manager Response: Hello Bill H,  We always appreciate feedback.  Thank you for pointing out that there are 2 types of reservations...  There are pre-paid, non-cancellable, non-changeable reservations, called Advance Purchase reservations.  There are also, general reservations that all have a 48 hour cancellation notice.  We certainly hope everything turned out for you heath wise, and that you will have a nice day.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We booked this room through Costco as a package deal when we took my son to Disneyland for the first time. There were 5 adults and 1 kid.  We are not small people and some of us have trouble sleeping so having two separate bedrooms (and 2 bathrooms) and a living room was great! We didnt use the kitchen except to pack lunches for our Disney days. Breakfast was really good, better than expected. Scrambled eggs every morning and some type of meat and some days we had potatoes! They had multiple waffle makers with Blueberry AND PUMPKIN batters on some days! Fruit, yogurt, pastries and drinks were also plentiful. I wish they opened breakfast a little earlier on weekends to get to the parks in time for opening, but not a huge deal with a 5 year old in tow.
Manager Response: Hello ekdizzy,  Thank you very much for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  And thank you so much for sharing your story.  What a great review.  It sounds like you and your family had a great time with us.  You know, I always say, that our hotel is for families, and we appreciate you.  We are also very proud to be a part of any successful family time together.  Please come and stay with us again soon and for a while.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: This was our 3rd visit to Staybridge Suites Anaheim Resort, and we will continue to book here because this hotel is worth every penny.  The staff is friendly, helpful, and trustworthy. The hotel is clean and offers awesome amenities like free hot breakfast, weekday evening receptions with free food & drinks, and an on-site convenience store for last minute items. This hotel is also conveniently located and includes free parking, or a shuttle stop for the ART. I especially love having a full size refrigerator, microwave, and stove - it comes in handy for those leftovers!   I only have a few minor complaints/suggestions:   1. Offer something for breakfast other than potatoes/eggs/sausage/bacon. How about biscuits and gravy? Or an omelet station?  2. We were sent an email before
Manager Response: Hello Tina S,  Thank you for staying with us and returning as well...  That makes you part of our family.  I appreciate all the kind words and also the feedback on the areas where we can improve.  I know we will see you again and hopefully get you in sooner.  We are so very busy, we do try to get you in as soon as possible...  making sure the suite is ready for you and your family is our pleasure.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: If you look at the photos on the web site the rooms all have a wall separating the lounge from the bedroom so when booking we were misled to believe that our suite would have a separate lounge.  We were so disappointed when we checked in as their "Queen Suite" is smaller than a normal hotel room!  We had just one room and it was so claustrophobic, the front desk apologized but said they could do nothing for us as they had no other rooms available and couldn't refund our money as we had paid in full before arriving!  The bathroom is so small that my husband could hold both walls while standing in the room.  We will never stay there again!
Manager Response: Hello _pauljcallan,  Thank you for staying with us.  Yes, when you reserve the studio suite, it is like a studio apartment, just 1 large room.  We are a very busy hotel and sometimes do not have a change of suite type once you get here, it has to be reserved ahead of time.  We certainly have 1 bedrooms suites and 2 bedroom suites, and we always suggest these for families.  Please pick one of the larger suites next time and I am sure you will enjoy your stay.  Please come and give us another try in a larger suite.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Very Nice Hotel....Well Worth the Stay!
Summary: While there are certainly cheaper hotels, this hotel was worth every penny!  Was greeted and treated very well has a IHG hotels member and was even given a handwritten note welcoming me to the hotel.  The hotel staff was fantastic and very friendly!  The free food and beverages during the week was a nice surprise as well.....saved me money on dinner!  The outdoor pool area was fantastic and clean and a great place to socialize with friends.  The room and entire hotel for that matter were extremely clean and the room features were great.  Beds were very comfortable as well.  The location right off interstate 5 is nice as well.  The restaurant next door (Burger Theory) that you get a coupon for is well worth the visit as well.  Fantastic bar and restaurant.  Overall, 10/10
Manager Response: Hello Brady K,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thanks especially for sharing your fantastic story with us.  Wow, I really appreciate your kind words and in pointing out some of the great things you really liked about our hotel and service.  We would love to have you and your whole family here again to stay with us soon, and for a long time.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Really good value; free breakfast; free parking free wifi; close to disneyland or shuttle to disneyland; good customer service. With pool and gym. Good size room with bath aircon tv etc. Will stay again
Manager Response: Hello scott c,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thanks also for pointing out some of the things you really enjoyed while you stayed with us recently.  Please come and stay with us again whenever you are in town.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: "3rd FAB Stay at the Staybridge Suites Anaheim-Resort Area Hotel"
Summary: Stayed at the Staybridge Suites Anaheim-Resort Area on Manchester Ave for the 3rd time in a year, and it's just as wonderful. Once again we didn't really stay here for Disney (except Downtown Disney at night), since we were mostly visiting: Universal Hollywood, the Samuel Oschin Planetarium; Huntington Dog Beach, and The Grove/Farmers Market areas. But we wouldn't dream of staying anywhere else, even if we traveled 1.5 hrs to get to most of the places.   First of all, we were introduced to Michael at the Front Desk. He was wonderful! Very courteous, warm, and friendly. Loved him! And Jimmy... once again your amazing hospitality was appreciated, and noted! And it's because of all the wonderful employees at the Staybridge Suites (from Front Desk to Housekeeping to Maintenance, et

Summary Heading: Best Value Fantastic Place to stay
Summary: We stayed on the 7th Floor in a 2 bedroom apartment because that's how I would describe them, and the rooms are fantastic with a living room a kitchen area with breakfast type bar, coffee machine, toaster, fridge freezer, hob and microwave oven, great bathrooms with shower / bath and they all have ironing boards and irons so no need to take a travel iron or hair dryer as these are also in every room.  Even a TV in the bedrooms! they are very spacious and such fantastic value, add to this free wifi, also a gym and a laundry what more do you need.  It is a great location only 5/10 minutes drive to Disney or you can catch the bus for a reasonable fee.  The whole complex was amazing the swimming pool shaped like Mikey Mouse Ears has plenty or seating / tables and loungers and also
Manager Response: Hello Keith B,  Thank you for staying with us again, and for filling out our survey.  I thank you greatly for sharing your family's story.  I loved all the detail, so honestly, someone reading your review can honestly could close their eyes, and just see the property.  I thank you especially for the mention of our caring staff and specifically mentioning Pam...  She is fantastic!  Thanks for noticing.  Please come again soon, you know our returning guests are truly our family. Until then...  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Very nice suites with a full kitchen and comfortable sleeping area also very close to Disneyland only a short  bus ride away. Monday through Wednesday the hotel provided free dinners in the lobby and free breakfast every morning. Very friendly staff and very accommodating.

We were pleased with the comfort and cleanliness of our 2 bedroom suite. The larger pool area is a nice setting nestled in palm trees. The breakfast area is spacious. The only con was the uncomfortable, lumpy square pillows.
Manager Response: Hello TravelingMamaGlv,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thanks also for sharing a review and for pointing out some of the great things you liked about your stay.  I apologize for the uncomfortable pillows.  Please come and stay with us any time you are in town.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed here for 8 nights, here is my advice:  Room: booked the 2 double beds room,  large , with great amenities (fridge, oven, dishwasher). Outdoor very large pool and spa (hot!) open til late was great. Guests have access to 3 outdoor BBQ's with complimentary propane (we used them every other night). Hotel even offers plastic plates and utensils for your bbq !! We LOVED this!!   Food: Breakfast buffet is the same EVERY single morning: hard boiled eggs, bagels, bread, waffles, scrambled eggs, watermelon, yogourt, coffee, tea, juices and bacon OR potatoes.  I would recommend this hotel and i would definitely book here again.   Cons: the pillows suck - they are WAY too soft. All guests in our room thought the same.
Manager Response: Hello  tropicaljess1,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thank you for the very detailed review.  It sounds like you and your family had a great stay and enjoyed lots of the amenities offered.  I do apologize that the pillows were not to your liking.  I hope that you guys have some great memories of your family trip and will come and stay with us again.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We landed in hotel at 8:00 pm there was hardly any hospitality n receptionists were very rude ,in mrng we got a call from reception that someone broke in our car which was parked in hotels car parking , when we asked d receptionist to show us the Cctv footage he replied that we can’t show u,it seemed they were all involved in the theft.
Manager Response: Hello Bharat J,  I do apologize that you did not have a good stay, and I certainly apologize if your vehicle was broken into on, or anywhere around our property.    Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Just returned from a seven night stay with my husband and two teenage girls. Checked in very, very late at night...which was not originally the plan. Our original flight was delayed multiple times and then diverted to a different airport. The front desk staff was understanding and accommodating. The airline lost all of our luggage and the front desk was also helpful with the process of having it delivered it to me while I was stressing out.   The room was spacious and well appointed. Light Housekeeping service was provided each day with one deep cleaning day.   Breakfast was good and what I would expect considering it was included with the price. No complaints. The M-W evening social was a nice touch.   Special thanks to Pam who led me in the right direction when my daughter
Manager Response: Hello Magical74,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thanks also for sharing your story with us.  Thanks for all the details.  And I have to say, I really appreciate the kind words about my front office staff. We really try hard to make your stay pleasant.  Please come again and stay with us soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: I use Staybridge pretty frequently when traveling just because I've always had a great experience. Needless to say this was also a great visit. We decided to stay in Anaheim because we had two colleges to scout. Breakfast was always hot and ready. Sometimes it's hard for me to find options for breakfast as I am vegetarian. However they definitely had such an array of varieties I did not need to worry.. Our room was very clean and well kept. Our kitchen offered everything we needed for our stay. The staff downstairs was always available when we needed them as well as courteous. We had a two bedroom suite and were very happy with our choice. As many families as there were we didn't hear any noise at night. Which was so nice. Parking was plenty and a few mins away were many options
Manager Response: Hello Thida T,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thanks also for sharing your story with us all.  Wow, it sounds like your family is at a very exciting time, with one on the way out to college.  I am so proud that we could be a part of that, very memorable experience.  Please come and stay with us and visit your freshman as much as possible.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: This is a great value -- nice rooms, with stove, fridge, dishwasher. Rooms clean and staff is very friendly.  This place lost 1 star from me, however, because the pool area was a public-health and safety disaster: The self-locking gate sometimes failed to stay locked, putting small children at risk. The fence around pool was wobbly. Inside, the pool area was dirty -- found a bloody band-aid stuck to the concrete, and it stayed there for 2 days before I peeled it off and tossed it in trash. Tables and chairs were strewn all over the place and never seemed to be put back in order at end of day. Clean towels provided, but they often fell out of a towel box-container whose door would not latch shut. The cabana bar only opened once in our 5-day stay there, for two hours at
Manager Response: Hello Ben W,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  I appreciate the kind words about our caring staff and clean, spacious suites.  I really want to apologize that we failed you when it comes to our pool and pool area cleanliness, and apparent safety-latch issue while you where with us.  I assure you, this is not our normal family friendly atmosphere that we normally enjoy.  Please accept my apology and come and stay with us again.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: This was not the original hotel I booked, but I was fairly happy with it.   It's a bit farther out, but that means lower rates and free parking. There is a decent amount of parking, but it does fill up to the max. They also offer a free breakfast and it starts early enough that you can usually take advantage, except on Magic Morning Hours for Disneyland, before heading out to do whatever you will be doing that day. It isn't the best of breakfasts, but for a hotel breakfast, it's decent. There is also a manager's reception which offers free snacks/meal and drinks with cheap wine and beer if you have an early day three times a week.   Location is actually nice. There is easy access to the freeway, which makes it easy to find and easy to get out to go places like LA, Universal, San
Manager Response: Hello LelahK,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thanks also for leaving such a detailed review.  Thanks for all the kind words about the staff and all the things you enjoyed, and I appreciate the feedback on where we can improve.  We do hope you will come and stay with us any time you are in town.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights early this month and there were a lot of things that we really enjoyed about our stay. Location was good and the Bus to the parks right next door was great!! Saved us so much on parking and was easy!! Dropped us off right in front of the park. The pool was very nice. Staff was friendly and helpful. Only downside was that the rooms/furniture/bedding are getting ready for a refresh. A little worn out. I am sure they get lots of traffic!! We will be back next time we are in Anaheim!!
Manager Response: Hello Good Trip,  Thank you very much for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thanks also for pointing out some of the things you liked about your stay.  We are really glad you and your family had a wonderful trip and we hope you will come again soon.  Jimmy

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights and it was perfect. The room was clean and very spacious. The hotel offers breakfast and it is very convenient, coffee, egs, bagels, cereal, just what you need to start the day. The shuttle to the parks stops outside the hotel every 20 minutes, bus #12. $15 usd for a family of 4, round trip.  I will stay here again in my next visit.  My only complaint would be that there are no kids channels on the TV, very weird.
Manager Response: Hello Vannylo82,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Wow...  what a great review.  I cannot get enough of that word "Perfect".  We are so glad we could be a part of your family's vacation.  Thanks again, and please come and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed in a two bedroom for ten nights. It is a great location for Disney not too far to walk but also buses are regular and stop right outside. A good breakfast included in price, and on tap good coffee all day. Very clean and a lovely size room. Exactly as I had seen on the website. We had a kitchen and were able to prep food if we wanted but right next door there is a Burger Theory and the food and service here is terrific! We ate here at least four times.  The staff at Staybridge are amazing and very helpful. This is a family friendly place to stay and gets very busy but we were pleased we stayed here.
Manager Response: Hello amituanai,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thanks so much for sharing your wonderful story with us all.  I really appreciate you mentioning our caring staff, and clean, spacious suites, and the Burger Theory Restaurant at Holiday Inn next door; they are fantastic!  Please come again and stay for a long while with us.    Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: My Favorite Off property Disneyland Hotel
Summary: I love this hotel.  Hands down my favorite place to stay off property.  It is far enough away to escape the insanity of the parks, yet still a 5 minute drive to the Toy Story lot AND you miss a lot of the traffic getting into the park going in the back way, on the streets, driving from this hotel.  The staff are nice and very helpful.  The rooms are always clean.  I have three teen children.  We always book the two bedroom suite.  It is very spacious.  It has two bathrooms, one in each bedroom, three TVs and a pullout sofa bed.  My twin girls take one bedroom, I take the other and my son sleeps on the pull out.  Everyone has a space.    The kitchen has fully stocked, has a full refrigerator, two stove top burners and a dish washer.  I order food from Amazon Pantry to be

Our family of 6 stayed again and everything again was great! My only critiques would be that the 2 beds in one of the suite rooms were tiny! Two adults really can't sleep comfortably in one bed. The other would be the breakfast, just so so.  Pam was still there and awesome!

Summary Heading: Beautiful stay, great facilities, friendly staff
Summary: I always know I've really loved a place when I get a bit teary when I leave,  and that happened here. The rooms are spacious and immaculate and the guest laundry is a HUGE bonus.  The breakfasts were basic but great and the evening snacks and drinks a really nice touch.  Only thing that bothered me was the vent in the bathroom - the fan from the roif could be heard through it but unfortunately they couldn't do anything about it. They kindly offered me earplugs but I did find that if the bathroom door was shut the noise was much more bearable.  I'd stay here again in a heat beat though.  Oh, and the iced lemon water in reception  - WINNING!!!
Manager Response: Hello SweetMrsH,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Wow...  what a great review.  And thank you so much for sharing your story.  I am so very happy you and your family had a great time with us and we are very proud to have been a part of such a great family trip.  Thanks again, and please come and stay with us again soon, and stay for  a while.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Fabulous hotel with extra touches which make for a great holiday. Loved the buffet breakfast and availability of free tea and coffee throughout the day. Very comfortable suite with full kitchenette. Great pool and whirlpool. Easy to get the Art shuttle to Disneyland from the adjoining hotel. Welcoming staff. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Fleurmort,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Even more so, thank you so much for sharing your lovely story.  It sounds like you and your family had a great vacation with us and we are so proud that you said that you "Would definitely recommend."  You even pointed out some of the amenities and services that you guys liked best.  I really appreciate you and I hope you come back and stay with us soon!  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights. Staff extremely friendly and helpful, especially Pam at reception. breakfast and social events were a lovely touch. Rooms spacious and enough room for 3 of us. The only reasons not given 5 stars were pull out sofa bed wasn't the most comfortable and although room and bathroom very clean, the bathroom could do with updating. Would definitely return.

We stayed here as part of our disney trip. We had a room with a full kitchen, a king size bed and a pull out couch. The room was a good size for the four of us. The beds were ok to sleep in. The kitchen comes with dishes, soap and salt and pepper. They have a pool and a hot tub in back of the hotel.    It is a distance from the resort so please use the shuttle. It only cost us $3 per person and you can use it as many times that day as you like. After walking around disney you'll appreciate it.
Manager Response: Hello georgemom,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thank you also for sharing a very detailed review on your stay.  I appreciate you mentioning some of the things you liked about the stay.  I also agree to recommend the ART shuttle to and from the parks.  You are so right...  after a long (great) day at the parks, the last thing you want to do is walk over a mile back to the hotel!  And the cost is very reasonable at $5.50 per day for adults and $2.00 per day for kids.  I hope you and your family will come and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Hotel was clean, breakfast was really good each morning, and hotel staff was helpful and nice. Pool was clean and grounds were kept. They were working on the elevators during our stay but it was not an issue. Would recommend and stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello EmKay823,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thank you even more for sharing your story with us and telling us some of the things you liked about your stay.  It looks like you really enjoyed our caring staff, our cleanliness, our wonderful breakfast, and our family pool/hot tub area.  I do apologize for the elevator restoration time; but I am happy to say it is finished and both elevators have bright new interiors.  I cannot wait for you to see it on your next visit.  Please come again and stay with us soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: I stayed here during a visit to Disney with my daughter and her friends. I had the one room suite and it was perfect for me. The bed was comfortable and the room was spacious. I had an issue with the ice maketr in my fridge that never got resolved but the staff was helpful in making sure that I had ice when needed it. The ART picks up roughly every 20 minutes to take guests to Disney and for a very reasonalble price. The  breakfast in the morning was well stocked and was just what I needed to get my day started.
Manager Response: Hello rykelmon,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thanks also for sharing your story with us.  I appreciate you mentioning a few of the things you liked about your stay.  It looks like you enjoyed your clean, spacious suite, our ART shuttle access, and our wonderful breakfast.  I apologize that the ice maker was not working in your suite.  I am so glad you and your daughter (and her friends) had a great stay.  It was our pleasure and we hope you will come and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here from June 11-14th, and it was exceptional. We drove from Denver, CO for a family trip with extended family. We got to Anaheim super early, and we went to check and see if we could check in early, and Pam at the front desk allowed us to. We were able to get breakfast, check in and unpack before the rest of my family got to town. The hotel room was clean, and had everything we needed. We were able to purchase ART tickets from the front desk, at a slight discount. The beds and pillows were really comfortable, as was all the room furniture. The breakfast was very good and filling, and seemed to be plentiful, as we never saw anything empty. There was also a wide variety of beverages. We will most definitely stay again on our next trip.
Manager Response: Hello Julia G,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thanks even more for sharing your story with us...  and Wow! What a great trip.  It sounds like you and your family really had a great time from beginning to the end.  And I appreciate you so much for recognizing Pam at our front desk for her great service efforts; she is fantastic!  She really cares, and it shows.  I really hope you and your family come and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We are staying here for 2 nights but so far we have only stayed one this hotel is amazing the pool is great the rooms a super welcoming and the staff are super nice. We had breakfast and it was probably the best hotel breakfast I've ever had. Aside from that. The pool only went to 4 feet deep but that's ok and there isn't a hot tub but that's okay too. We are staying here in June and the temperature gets to around 105 degrees but the pool makes it sooo okay. If you want a great vacation come here!
Manager Response: Hello LizTree16,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  Thank you so much for the kind words about the staff and our customer service; we really do try hard to make our guests feel at home.  I am so glad you liked the pool but surprised you did not find our hot tub...  it is just in the same area as the pool, and also shaped like Mickey's head.  I am sure you will find it next time, as I really hope you and your family will come and stay with us again.   Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: I recently stayed here with my wife and two small children while in our Disneyland vacation. This hotel offers everything we hoped for, and more.  We had the the one bedroom suite. The kitchen and separate living room provided the perfect living space for our family. The bathroom was large and perfectly clean. Overall the entire suite was clean (two small stains in carpet, but that's understandable), appropriately stocked and furnished, and the AC worked perfect.   The hotel amenities were very convenient. There is an ATM in the lobby, small pantry/store that sells a variety of commonly needed items, pool, etc.  If you need to rent stroller or ECV (electric scooter) the front desk is happy to recommend a couple of local companies that will deliver right to the hotel.   Breakfast
Manager Response: Hello Ari37,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out a survey.  And thank you so much for sharing your story with us.  Wow...  what a great review.  It sounds like you and your family had a great stay.  An extra BIG THANKS for recognizing Pam at our front desk.  She is really fantastic and really cares about our guests and our hotel.  Have a great day and please come and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Nice property with rare large swimming pool and resort style grounds
Summary: We had a studio suite with a kitchen, nicely equipped.  Bed is comfortable, and they also have breakfast included, and some nights with a free get together.  The manager J. is such a friendly man, always willing to help!  The grounds are the highlight here, gorgeous, with outdoor bbq area, lots of nice seating, and a lovely large heated pool. and hot tub area.  This hotel is close to the Honda Centre, and outdoor area, a bit farther to the Disney park, but we were not there for that.  There is a store on site with a few items, including some ice cream novelties.  I would only change the pots and pans, they are not stainless, so all the food sticks to them and makes it really hard to clean.
Manager Response: Hello travelwiseandpicky,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  And thanks so much for sharing your story with us.  It looks like you guys had a great time and shared lots of things that you guys liked about our hotel and property.  A special BIG THANKS for recognizing me for good service; I really appreciate it.  We would love to have you come and stay with us again soon.  Next time bring the whole family!  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Pam at the front desk has been exceptional during both of our visits here.  She is super friendly, helpful and professional.  The motel is located on the Anaheim Resort Transportation (ART) bus line, about 10 minutes to Disneyland.  The breakfast buffet is good with plenty of warm items.  The room was clean and well stocked.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello PWTWA,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out our survey.  A BIG THANKS for recognizing Pam for her great customer service; she really is a GEM.  I also appreciate all the kind words on our breakfast, our clean spacious suites, and the ART shuttle access.  Please come again very soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Staybridge Suites for 8 nights, from 2nd-10th April. We had a very friendly greeting from the reception staff and the booking in process was very friendly and relaxed. We were very lucky to get an upgrade as there were 4 of us so would make our stay more comfortable. The suite was very spacious, clean and really lovely. There was a great range of various things available for breakfast that would suit everyone. Tea and coffee was available all day. The staff were all so helpful and so friendly. The pool and surrounding area was also really nice and on the last couple of days we were there, a pool bar opened for a short while which was a nice treat to have a cocktail whilst relaxing! There was another hotel next door which had a restaurant and bar which we could

Stayed for a weekend, while visiting Disneyland with kids. The hotel is ok, it is beginning to show it's age.  The rate was reasonable compared to the others, about a 10 minute drive south of Disneyland.  Would probably not stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello faby99,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out the survey.  I appreciate the feedback as it will help improve our service and product.  I hate to hear that you would not probably stay again.  I hope you would have a change of mind.  We hope to see you again.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Super service. Thanks to Pamela at front desk , we got an upgraded room which we were very appreciative of .  Love the fact we get complimentary breakfast each morning and 3 days a week free supper (social as they call it ).  Free parking is also a bonus !  I feel this hotel is good value , I appreciated the great service and the hotel was clean and fairly up to date and well maintained.  I would recommend this place to anyone .
Manager Response: Hello KSHMIDTFUNK,  Thank you for staying with us and sharing your story.  Wow...  what a great review.  And thank you very much for recognizing Pam at our front desk...  she is fantastic!  Of course, it is easy with great families like you guys.  Please come and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: To be perfectly honest, we were only in our hotel room for nine hours; we checked in at around 11 pm and checked out the next morning at around 8 am. But, we both really enjoyed our stay.  Everybody that I spoke with, from the time I made the reservation (I called after booking online to ensure they got my request for a pet-friendly room - side note: the entire hotel is pet-friendly!) to the time we checked out was friendly and helpful. In fact, the guy that checked us in (I wish I could remember his name) was the happiest person I've met in a while. I had called him a few hours before, to let the hotel know we'd be checking in late, and he remembered my name and said he was glad that we arrived a bit earlier so that he could be there to check us in.  The hotel room was clean
Manager Response: Hello Jessica S,  Thank you for staying with us and for filling out a survey and sharing your story.  I appreciate your detailed review.  It sounds like you didn't have long to stay with us this time, but you liked what you saw...  Please come and stay with us when you stay for a while.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: This is an excellent, family friendly hotel for a Disney trip. Great breakfast, free parking, good price for Disney shuttle, and the staff is super nice. Special shout out to Manager Jimmy Raynor! Who was gracious to even help personally with an Amazon package that got routed to the Hotel. Place is well kept, looks good, room was always neat. Will definitely stay there next time!
Manager Response: Hello Eric,  Thank you very much for staying with us and for sharing your story with us.  Hey and a BIG shout out, right back at you guys...  It looks like you really enjoyed everything...  the breakfast, the ART shuttle, the breakfast, the parking, and our staff.  I really appreciate you recognizing my service efforts and it was a pleasure when you are helping such a great family.  I remember you guys well and I really hope you come back and stay with us again soon!  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: My family stayed here recently when visiting Disneyland. We chose this facility as it had 2 bathrooms in a room, to help facilitate getting ready in the morning. The rooms were very nice and modern, with full kitchen. The front desk staff was amongst the friendliest we have ever experienced!  Hot breakfast was excellent!  It was 1.9 miles from Disneyland, and some members of the party walked it (actually faster at park closing time compared to standing in long line for Disney shuttle to parking lot, and sitting in traffic to get out). Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello Bellinghamster64,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your story with us.  It looks like your family really enjoyed our spacious suites, are friendly front office staff (thanks again), and our location.  We really appreciate you and we hope that you will come and stay with us again soon, and stay for a long time.  Until then...  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Gave away our rooms, paid for months in advance
Summary: We booked two large suites for a family reunion. When we arrived, they told us they didn't have any information regarding our reservations. Even with a printed confirmation in my hand. Then with more checking, said they were not expecting us until the following month. So we contacted the travel agency that booked the rooms for us...they too had the same reservation dates as we did with a fax confirmation....they had nothing open for us, said our rooms were given away due to a convention in town. This is what we got for paying months in advance, The guy at the check in counter was very rude. In my opinion, if someone pays in advance, those rooms should be available, and the new guests should have been sent elsewhere. We ended up an hour away from Disneyland...not thanks to
Manager Response: Hello ctrwisely,  Thank you for using the response tool.  I believe you may be speaking about the Staybridge that has not yet opened in Anaheim.  Please come and stay with us anytime.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: I chose this hotel because it offered a 2 bedroom 2 bathroom suite, perfect for our 5 person party, 4 adults and 1 teen. The suite was spacious and comfortable, my only complaint is the commode is short and made a noise when sat on. It was great to have a fridge for drinks and snacks. We never used the stove or microwave. Maid service each day for new towels and to make the beds, empty trash. Breakfast was decent, but they start putting everything away at 9:30 (M-F) on the dot, no forgiveness if you're a few minutes late. They lock up the beverage machines and put away the cereal and left overs. They did leave the cold fruit out a little longer.  The kitchen staff were proficient but not friendly, just doing their job. The front desk staff were very friendly and helpful.  We
Manager Response: Hello Shopkinsnest,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your review with us.  I am so glad that you and your family enjoyed your spacious, clean suite... and for liking the breakfast and our staff generally.  Of course, I want to apologize to you that we were so abrupt with the breakfast removal; I do not beleive that the staff meant to be rude, even though it sounds like it felt that way.  I will address this with our staff.  We really love our families that stay here and we appreciate you.  Please come again the next time you and your family come to town.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Visit staybridge suites in February for a few nights. The hotel is ok but not the best, very small bed however comfy. Bathroom is again very small. Not keen on kitchen in bedroom but obviously helpful for some. Overall great stay.
Manager Response: Hello Gracie9393,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking your valuable time to review your stay.  I am glad you had a great stay, probably in our studio suite according to your description.  You may prefer the 1 bedroom king suite on your next stay; that way it will give you the room that would give us that extra star.  And more importantly, you would be more comfortable.  Please come and stay again with us soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great front desk, awesome breakfast and in-room amenities!
Summary: Please indicate if you found this review to be helpful as it will help me focus on my future efforts. We stayed at the Staybridge Suites Anaheim Resort Area hotel the last week of February and found it to be an outstanding experience. The highlights for us were great service, a generous breakfast and many amenities. Excellent value paid for the price.  The front desk was absolutely friendly, conversant and pleasant with Breanna and Jimmy. They were quick, efficient, accommodating and appeared to be genuinely interested in helping out customers. I noticed small details that staff thought of during my stay, and they went out of their way for small things like filling up our water bottle with ice.  The breakfast was generous and started our day off right. We went shortly after the
Manager Response: Hello jjluke,  Wow...  What a great response and I love the details in your story.  I appreciate that you took your valuable time to write out a well thought out review.  I believe your focus to be very up lifting for our staff members and very informative for future guests; so I think it is brilliant.  I have to thank you especially, for recognizing Briana and myself at check in.  You know, you are right we do genuinely care about our guests and we like each other and work well together as a team.  That atmosphere is really priceless and it spills over into the service, and the interaction we have with our guests.  Please come again and stay with us.  We will look forward to welcoming you again.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: The fact that we've been here five times should tell you how much we love it! We continue to return due to their affordability and value.  The rooms are large and have recently been updated. We can cook food in the room and spread out thanks to the living area and separate bedrooms.   It's a huge perk to have a complimentary full breakfast offered downstairs that fuels us up for a day of exploring. Some days even offer afternoon appetizers that could be used as supper!  We found the staff to be helpful and kind and willing to help us with whatever we need. We will continue to return to this gem of a location!
Manager Response: Hello CarolynLeanne,  Wow...  What a great review.  Thank you so much for staying with us again...  And I cannot say enough, that our relationship with our return guests is so important to us, and YOU are our family.  The story you shared says it all and we look so forward to being here for you again... to come home!  We truly hope to see you again soon.    Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager
