Summary: Anywhere you stay that helps launch you to Disneyland is going to be fondly remembered, but this place is good. There is a reliable shuttle service to Disneyland, just make sure you get in early. Rooms are comfortable and adequately self-contained and the staff, service and ameneties are great. Excellent pool, servicable gym, great breakfast included. Could stay there happily everafter.
Manager Response: Hello howardtj,  What a Great review...  Thank you for staying with u s and for sharing your "fairytale" story.  Actually it was a great story and we are very happy you and your family enjoyed our spacious suites, our staff, our breakfast, and pool and amenities.  We really hope you all will come and stay with us again soon.    Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: Our Second Stay here Staff made you feel at home as we were remembered they went out of their way to help the rooms were clean and comfortable. Breakfast changes every other day but very set. The Pool is great for kids as well as adults has Laundry facility and Gymnasium. easy access onto Freeway Bus stop for Downtown Disney 2 minutes walk next Door.  MTW Free Food Beer Wine and Soda.  Great Sports Bar next Door family Oriented and do Great burgers  Even Bunless wrapped in lettuce.  best Rooms would be towards the back and higher that 1st Floor freewy outside a little noisey but not too bad
Manager Response: Hello Niraheto,  Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to review your recent stay with us.  Thank you also for being a return guest; that makes you our family and it was our pleasure making sure your "Stay was Relaxing".  Please come again soon and bring the whole family!

Summary Heading: Good place to stay with family
Summary: Pros:  Front desk service was amazing Amazing beds Wi-fi was excellent Suite was large with good kitchen. Breakfast was good and the pool complex was incredible. Easy shuttle to Disneyland  Cons:  Kitchen could do with some more utensils and a kettle. No gluten free options for the buffet breakfast.  Excellent spacious place to stay with family.
Manager Response: Hello Andy66lee,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience with us.  We appreciate that you like our Wi-Fi, beds and spacious suites, pool and hot tub, and a special thanks for the recognition of our Front Desk Staff.  My staff works really hard in a fast paced hotel and I am very excited whenever guests notice that how much they care about our guests.  I appreciate the feedback on areas where we can improve.  Please come and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with the family
Summary: On arrival was told that they had upgraded us to a two bedroom suite which made life even better. lounge and dining area were well appointed with a  useful kitchen area attached. Flat screen TV's in bedrooms and lounge made life easy if someone wanted to watch a different channel. Two queen sized beds in each bedroom as well as an en suite in each. hot water was instantly hot and stayed that way for your whole shower. The desk staff were extremely helpful with any questions about places to eat or visit. Bus for Disneyland attractions leaves from in front of the Holiday Inn which is next door. Breakfast was included of a morning which we hadn't known when we booked and was a pleasant surprise. All round this is a great place to stay with good amenities and only a short walk to
Manager Response: Hello greyoldbear,  Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to review your recent stay with us.  It looks like you and your family had a great vacation.  It sounds like you enjoyed the spacious suites, our food/beverage options, our location, and our staff.  Thank you for staying with us and please come back and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: 2nd FAB Stay at the Staybridge Suites Anaheim-Resort Area Hotel
Summary: My daughter and I stayed at this resort before when visiting Disney in August/Sept of 2016 for her birthday. This trip (Jan/Feb 2017) was to visit Universal Studios Hollywood, and  even though it wasn't local to the theme park, we chose to stay at the Staybridge Suites Anaheim-Resort Area hotel due to the amazing stay we previously had. And once again it didn't disappoint. From the superior check-in service by Jimmy at the Front Desk, to the suite itself (super clean and spacious), the complimentary breakfast and social hour, overall location, and being pet friendly for our small dog (whom we also brought along), it's a fantastic stay... and honestly, we can't think of staying anywhere else when in the area. Even the 2.5 hr trip back from Universal was worth it to stay at this
Manager Response: Hello englishyankee1,  Thank you for that truly fantastic review.  Your kind words about our staff, our spacious suites, and our cleanliness are very appreciated.  I especially thank you very much for recognizing me at check-in; returning guests are always like family coming home.  I would like to say I think it is also pretty terrific of you to offer directions to other guests in your review.  It would be our pleasure for you and your family to come and stay with us again soon.  Cheerio!  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, wonderful staff
Summary: We had a very positive visit at this hotel. While enduring the chaos of the California freeways it was nice to come back to a quiet place to unwind. The front desk staff were very welcoming and went above and beyond to make sure our stay was both comfortable and relaxing. Breakfast was sufficient to start the day although a bit repetitive.  Our room was great and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Hello 176deb,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  We also really appreciate your recommendation.  It looks like you enjoyed our location, our food/beverage options, and our staff.  We really make an effort in customer service and satisfaction and we are so glad you noticed.  Please come and stay with us again soon, and bring the whole family.

Summary: Nice clean rooms.  We had a 1 bedroom suite for 3 adults and 1 child and it was a bit cramped, but for 2 adults and 2 children would be fine.  ART, Anaheim Rapid Transit stops right next door at Holiday Inn and only 1 stop froM Disneyland.  Great breakfast buffet.
Manager Response: Hello rhenderson1225,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  It looks like you enjoyed the suite, our location, the ART shuttle, and our food/beverage options.  We thank you for staying with us and we hope you will come and stay again.

Summary: Average hotel for the money you pay.  Might be better for families, but not recommended for couples trip.  Suite does have kitchen appliances (microwave, fridge, etc) but the rooms are a little outdated.
Manager Response: Hello djleethal,  Thank you for taking your time to comment about your recent stay with us.  We are a family hotel, but are a great value for any traveler as well.  Have a great new year.

Summary: Perfect stay for us and our dog. We had the suite with a full kitchen so we were able to make some meals. As to be expected there were tons of families with kids so we were happy to eat in our room. There is no designated pet walking area but we found a place at an RV park next door. There is a small daily pet fee. We were not right next to Disney which was nice because less traffic but close enough that it took  us about 10 mins in an Uber. The room was clean and spacious and we had a TV in both the bedroom and the seating area. The hotel is right next to a Holiday Inn and they have buses come to their door to take you to Disney so that you don't have to bring your car.
Manager Response: Hello DiegoFlorida,  Thank you for taking your time to detail a review of your recent stay with us.  It sound like you and your family (including your pet) had a great stay.  It looks like you really enjoyed the clean, spacious suites, our location, and the way our suites are set up.  We really are glad you had a good time and hope you all will come and stay with us again soon.  Happy new year!

Summary: Loved our stay at Staybridge jimmy and the girls at reception were just awesome.the free breakfast was great everyday.the bus comes every 20 mins for Disney which is really easy. Loved this stay very clean room and great facilities
Manager Response: Hello Brett C,  Wow...  What a great review.  Thank you very much for coming to stay with us and for all the kind words.  I especially appreciate that you recognized me and my staff as we do try very hard to make everyone feel at home.  It looks like you also enjoyed the suite's cleanliness, the ART shuttle for the parks, and our breakfast.  Please come again soon.  Happy new year!  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here on a Family Trip from Texas to California. We weren't sure if we were going to be heading to Disneyland or not, so I wanted to get a hotel in the area just in case. This would be a great place to stay if you were going to the theme park. It was decorated with Disney décor and felt like you were staying on property ( we have done so many times in Disney World). We did not end up at Disneyland but still enjoyed the hotel immensely. The room was large, like a small apartment. Loved how it was two separate rooms and full kitchen (cook top and full size fridge/dishwasher). Also that the sink was separate from the toilet/shower, that is always a challenge with a large family. During our stay they not only offered free breakfast, but also had free dinner. It was a small
Manager Response: Hello mary h,  Thank you for taking the time to detail a review of your last stay.  It looks like you and your family had a great time.  It sounds like you really enjoyed the spacious suite, our food and beverage options, and our pool and hot tub.  Please come and stay with us again soon!

Summary: They were kind to save a 1st floor suite so I didn't have to take my scared dog on the elevator.  I stayed for the quite and peace.  Very relaxing, I ended up sleeping until after 10:30 am.  They let me stay until 12 so I could get packed up and out without an extra charge.  The room felt like home.  I will stay again.
Manager Response: Hello Ann H,  Thank you for taking your time to review your recent stay with us.  It looks like you really enjoyed our pet friendliness, our attention to requests, and our staff.  Not to mention, it looks like you got some great sleep while here.  Thank you for all the kind words and please come and stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Management dishonest after we were robbed
Summary: We moved in there in August 2016 as extended stay guests due to my husbands job doing high voltage line work, we moved out of our home and put it on the market so we were grateful that they had storages available inside the hotel which we moved our valuables into. Our stay was great as far as hospitality and comfort and convenience of the room, we had been living there instead of getting an apartment due to the uncertainty of my husbands job week to week even though we were paying 4K a month to live there. We didn't mind the price and took care of our room ourselves with my own supplies ect. We had been there 6 months when our storage units got broken into, mind you these units are in the hallways inside the hotel, they broke into both of our units within 3 days and even split
Manager Response: Dear Crissie B,  I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience at the Staybridge Suites Anaheim Resort Area, CA.  While reading your review, I was very surprised with what you had to go through, considering that this incident happened at the start of your extended stay. I understand how frustrating the situation can be, most especially when personal belongings and savings are involved. I am very interested to learn more about the details of the incident and how it was handled. I have sent a private message requesting for such information and I am hopeful that we can get I can get a positive response from you.  Once again, thank you for your time and patience and we look forward to working with you in getting a resolution to the concerns you raised.   Sincerely,   Wazay P.  Case Manager  IHG Service

Summary: We were lucky enough to get a very good travel agent rate for a one bedroom suite. There's plenty of space in the living room that could accommodate 2 more guests, if needed. Upon check in, I asked if there's a complimentary water in the room, the front desk lady said that there's none but she gave me two bottles from their Pantry for free!    The free breakfast area is huge unlike at the other IHG hotels. We loved the food selection and there's always plenty of fruits throughout the breakfast time. While other hotels would have mixed fruits in a platter, in this hotel there's a big platter for each kind of fruit. There are 3 waffle maker units so people don't need to line up to make one. Food is tasty and warm. There's always staff to check if there's enough food in the buffet
Manager Response: Hello guinevere_j,  Thank you for making a detailed review of your recent stay with us.  It looks like you really enjoyed our spacious suites, our food/beverage options and our staff.  Thank you also for letting us know areas where we need improvements.  It's good feedback that helps us make our services even better.  Thanks again and come and stay with us whenever you are in town.

Summary: This was our 3rd stay at Staybridge and we never leave disappointed. Spacious rooms, updated kitchens, super friendly and helpful staff. Full breakfast in the morning is a huge plus, as well as the nightly social (on specific days) with food, beer and wine. While you may be able to book a cheaper hotel, the cost savings of having a full kitchen, full breakfast, and the light dinner at the nightly social, more than makes up for the extra cost. Love having a separate bedroom, location is great, and shuttles run at least every 20 minutes. All around great hotel!!

So why is it great ?  1. Location is near the freeways, but you cant hear the cars. 2. Rooms - Clean we arrived early our room not read, but we arrived at 11:00 am so thats fine. They called us at 2:00 when it was ready, they held our bags and checked us in.  3. Not all Disney- it was nice warm colors for hotel inside, walk in to building and fireplace with large open meeting area, rest, visit with others for meetings. Big area.  Trees cover and hid your surrounding areas.  4. Breakfast was above and beyond that was all free. 5. Staff knew the areas for other things besides Disney.  6. No charge for parking or Wifi  7. Hotel seemed very open and spacey ( not squished feeling) not banging into people  8. Burger place next door( we did not go) -but its walking 300 ft  9. Out side

Our family booked the two bedroom suite for our stay at Disneyland.  Let me say the reviews I read didn't do this hotel justice.  It is super nice.  The staff was Uber friendly and the suite was spacious enough that 5 adults and a toddler didn't feel like we were all on top of each other.  The pool area is spacious and the hotub was located away from the pool, so it allowed for adult conversation away from the noise of kids playing in the pool.  There is two BBQ grills if you want to cook out and LOTS of outdoor seating.  The hotel is pet friendly and has large grassy areas for your furry family to get busy (they even provide doggy bags) The hot breakfast bar is HUGE and offers fresh fruits, eggs, bacon/sausage, friend potatoes, waffles, assorted breads and muffins, cereals,
Manager Response: Hello Teri M,  Wow, what a great review!  Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to review your recent stay with us.  You really took the time to detail some of your thoughts.  It looks like you guys enjoyed everything.  Please come back and bring the family  and stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Best hotel in Anaheim for families
Summary: OK I never ever ever leave feedback's for anything  I showed up early at 2:30 and asked if there's anyway they can check us in early they went out of there way to check us in early  The breakfast in the morning was pretty good you can catch a bus to Disneyland for a fee  They have a swimming pool but we did not use it they have 24 hour laundry which is awesome  There's an awesome burger place right next-door they have decent snacks at night for free  The kitchen even had a dishwasher which I was surprised  Our room was very clean and modern well looked after  But honestly what made The hotel special was the stuff extremely friendly very helpful and they go out of their way to help you  Thanks guys  The  Heffner Family

I usually do a lot of researching before booking a hotel.  This one did not disappoint!  We were 6 adults and 2 small children, therefore I booked a 2 bedroom//2 bathroom suite.  The suite was big enough, with a full kitchen and 2 full bathrooms.  We ate breakfast there every day.(for 8 days)  True, by the end of the week, the breakfast was a bit tiresome, but hey, it saved us a lot of money by being included in the price.  Parking was free, the pool was great, and the D/L shuttle came right next door.  Our suite was clean, with fresh towels daily, and beds made.  Perfect for us!

My family just stayed at the Staybridge for 10 days for our disneyland holiday. Its a great hotel that provides great value for money. The bus stop is just outside to get to disney or sandiego zoo or universal and the Customer Service was great. I also highly recommend Burger Theory next door.

I booked 2 one bedroom suites with double beds at this hotel and my family loved it.  It is about a 5 minute drive to Disneyland.  They served free drinks/snacks one night and free breakfast buffet in the mornings. The hotel was clean and rooms were nice and spacious. Everything looked brand new.  We would come back to this hotel again.
Manager Response: Hello Satisfiedsleeper,  Thank you for taking some time to recap your recent stay with us.  We are so happy you and your family enjoyed the hotel.  It looks like you enjoyed the spacious suite, our location, and food/beverage options.  Please come again and stay with us soon!

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Check-in was super easy and Leigha was very attentive!  Room was clean and spacious. We were worried about noise so close to the freeway but we really didn't notice any noise. Breakfast was good with lots of table space so you could still find a table when it was busy. Short distance to Disney and you can buy your ART tickets at the desk as well as Disney tickets. We would stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello Carl E,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  Thanks especially for recognizing Leigha and her wonderful customer service; we appreciate it.  And it looks like you enjoyed the spacious suite, our breakfast offerings, and our location.  Please come again and bring the whole family.

Summary: Staybridge has consistently been my go to hotel when traveling with my family. Their rooms are large and offer plenty of space for the entire family including the dog. As always, a good breakfast spread and clean accommodations. This location is a little more worn and receives a significant amount of traffic due to Disneyland being 3-5 miles away but overall we were satisfied with our stay and visit to Disney.
Manager Response: Hello Hank,  Thank you for taking your valuable time to review your recent stay with us.  It sounds like you really know your Staybridge Brand.  We really do have 2 to 3 times as much hotel traffic as other Staybridge Suites.  It looks like you really enjoy the space of our suites, our pet friendly policy, and our food/beverage options.  Please come back and stay with us whenever you are in town.

Summary: This is my first time here and I would definitely come back.  There were some minor issues but Jimmy and Leigha did their best to make them right. Everyone is very friendly and helpful.  The rooms are very nice but I am not a fan of the wall unit cooling system in the studios which is especially odd given that the other rooms have central air. Housekeeping is erratic but in spite of that the facility is clean and well maintained. The business center computers kept crashing and were very slow when online and definitely need an update. The pool is beautiful and the breakfast buffet is very nice. Surprisingly quiet given all the kids and families.
Manager Response: Hello fcrane35,  Thank you for taking your time to detail your recent stay with us.  A special thanks for recognizing Leigha and myself for the friendly, helpful service; that means a lot to both of us.  I want to apologize for the lobby business center and housekeeping issues while you were with us.  It does look like you enjoyed the breakfast and staff.  You folks are wonderful and we wish you to come and stay with us again soon.

Summary: This all suite hotel is such a nice alternative to staying at Disneyland resort. The kitchen is a God sent. The breakfast buffet is all you could ask for. Very good. Social hour is fun and the food and drinks could be considered your evening meal. It's our favorite place to stay when we travel to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Romac125,  Thank you for taking the time to share a review from your last stay with us.  I love that quote, "our favorite place".  What a great little phrase that says it all.  It looks like you guys enjoyed our hotel, our spacious suites, and our food/beverage options.  We are so happy that you chose to stay with us and it sounds like we will see you again; we hope very soon!  Have a great day.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: This is a great place for families & groups to stay. We got an apartment with two bedrooms which both had their own bathrooms and a common area with a kitchen. You can order your first lot of groceries online with free delivery if over $49. There is also a complimentary breakfast buffet available too! You also get free wifi and make local phone calls. There is a bus that you can take to get directly to Disneyland that runs every 20mins which delivers you right to the entrance. They have daily tickets as well as 3 & 5 day passes which are very cheap. E.g. 5 days is $20. Staff are very friendly and helpful too! Nothing seems to be a problem.
Manager Response: Hello Felicity F,  Thank you very much for taking your time to review your recent stay with us.  It sounds like you guys had a great time.  Also thanks for detailing a lot of great information for future guests.  A special thanks for the kind words about our staff; we really try hard to ensure guests a great stay.  Please come again and stay with us soon.

Summary: Well first of all really close to Disneyland, you can drive or either take a bus with $30 3 days pass for four people(2 adults 2 kids) Pam and Jimmy Front Desk receptionist are awesome, they help us and guide through the bus ride and also made reservations when I asked what's best dinner place in town. Also help me step a surprise for my wife for our first year anniversary. really enjoyed staying here and will come back again 😊
Manager Response: Hello ravilucky,  Thank you for taking your time to review your recent stay with us.  Also, a special thanks for recognizing Pam and me for our service for you; we both appreciate it.  And we hope that we made your stay just a little better.  Please come and stay with us again soon!

Summary: We had a great stay here in late September of 2016. Overall, a really nice hotel! The staff was very friendly and helpful. When we had a couple of minor issues, they were resolved to our satisfaction. We had to request bathroom linens a few nights, but that was a minor issue. Hotel itself is really clean, the suites are spacious; however, they could benefit from an update. Great breakfast buffet, pool, and social events at night with complimentary food and beverages. If I could give the hotel a 4.5 or even 4.75, I certainly would. Staybridge Suites is a great value for the money. Keep in mind that this hotel is really not within walking distance to Disneyland, but there is an inexpensive shuttle service that will transport you to the parks. Should we ever return to California,
Manager Response: Hello Greg N,  Thank you for your detailed review of your recent stay with us.  It looks like you guys had a pretty great time.  I apologize for any issues that you had and appreciate the notation that all was handled to your satisfaction.  Please bring the family and come and stay with us again soon.

Summary: We just returned home from an 8 day stay at this hotel. EVERY single one of the front staff, housekeeping and maintenance staff that we encountered was cheerful, friendly and accommodating. In addition, they were helpful on tips to make our vacation in sunny California even better. Thank you for your excellence in customer service. You truly excel at what you do and we will recommend you to everyone we know.
Manager Response: Wow...  what a great review!  Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your recent stay with us went.  I especially want to thank you for the wonderful, kind words you had about our staff; we really try hard everyday to make everything perfect and we are so happy you noticed.  Thanks again for the recommendation, and please come and stay with us again soon.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: We took our children & grandchildren to Disneyland for a week
Summary: There were 3 families, each family of 4 had a king suite. This was a separate bedroom, small livingroom, a kitchen & bathroom.  The size of the rooms was very adequate.  The rooms were very dirty.  When you check in they tell you they will do a daily clean of changing linens & supplying fresh towels.  They told us they would do a "big clean" in the middle of our week.  That was not done to any of the rooms!  Our room had raw sewage seeping into the bathtub from the overflow in the tub, our son's toilet ran constantly until it started to overflow & he had to shut the water off to it, our daughters room had water seeping up under their kitchen floor every time they stepped on the floor.  Many people on this he first floor around us were complaining and asking to be moved.  The
Manager Response: Hello larryg1194,  I thank you very much for giving your honest account of your last visit with us.  I also thank you for pointing out some of our great qualities, like our staff.  I need to apologize that we did not provide the quality, consistent service that we strive to provide.  I have not received a letter or email, maybe there was an error.  I would be glad to speak to you in any media you would like.  Fell free to call me at 714/748-7700.  Please have a nice day and come and give us another try.  Jimmy Raynor Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights to visit disneyland, staff were wonderful, room was clean and spacious and breakfast was excellent with a good variety. We walked to the park each day but they did offer a shuttle bus for $5. Would recommend a stay here
Manager Response: Hello Ashleigh F,  Thank you for taking your time to recap your recent stay with us.  It really looks like you enjoyed our staff, our spacious suites, our location, and food/beverage options.  We are very happy to be a part of your vacation.  Thanks again for the recommendation and please come and stay with us again.

Summary: We stayed here for a family trip to Disneyland.  We had a two bedroom suite. They have a great hot breakfast buffet. We happened to be here on Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday nights, which was great because they have a social hours with enough food to provide a pretty decent dinner. I would recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Hello Randi S,  Thank you for taking your valuable time to review your recent stay with us.  It looks like your family had a great time and really enjoyed your suite and our food and beverage options.  Thanks also for the recommendation.  Please come and stay with us whenever you are in town.

Summary: This hotel was the perfect distance from Disney- with a $5/day bus connection to Disney. This keeps you from having to pay to park and drops you off right at the park entrance.  The hotel offers free breakfast- but doesn't have enough seating for all of the patrons who are eating. Also- the fitness room was kind of lame because you have to check out parts of the machines at the front desk- which is always busy and understaffed because you can purchase Disney tickets there as well.
Manager Response: Hello Amanda C,  Thank you for taking some time to review your recent stay with us.  It looks like you liked our location and breakfast; I apologize that there wasn't enough seating options when you came down for breakfast.  We do keep the fitness center "attachments" for the weight machine for adults at the front desk so that younger kids do not try and use the machines and hurt themselves.  Please come and stay with us again when you are in town.

Summary Heading: Clean room and excellent customer service
Summary: We stayed here for three days while visiting Disneyland. The front desk manager, Jimmy, was very friendly and helpful and advised us of all the hotel commodities. In addition to having clean suite that slept 5 people, we really enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and evening manager's reception. We would definitely stay here again for our next visit.
Manager Response: Hello jefhar,  Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to review your recent stay with us.  I have to give a special thanks for recognizing me as helpful and friendly during your stay, I appreciate it.  And it also looks like you enjoyed the cleanliness and space in our suites, and our food/beverage options.  I do hope you folks will come and stay with us again soon.  Have a great day!

Summary: I requested 2-2 room suite for our family vacation.  Everyone in my family was so impressed and pleased with our rooms.  Both of the suites were so nice.  The rooms were updated and clean.  The kitchen had everything we needed.  The staff was very nice and helpful.  The breakfast was well done; it had something for everyone.   I truly felt like it was a home away from home.  I will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello bjowells,  Thank you very much for taking your time to review your recent stay with us.   It sounds like your family really enjoyed the suites and their cleanliness, our staff, and our food/beverage options.   Wow, what a great review.  Please come and stay with us again and bring more of the family!

Summary Heading: Shocking clean and pleasant to stay at.
Summary: I truly enjoyed my experiance !! I had come from a complete dump in San Diego and when I walked in I was super duper surprised that the place was so attractive and clean. The lush landscaping was superb. The suite was actually like a little house and it was spacious and beautifully furnished. It was done with all the most modern, attractive touches down to the sink in the kitchen . It had pans and a dishwasher and a large refrigerator. It was quiet and the windows open 6 inches for fresh air. The breakfast was done well and I really liked the eggs and salsa. The fresh yogurt and cut peaches were fabulous!! The bed was dreamy and lots of hot water and a nice size bathroom. I thought based on a 3 star hotel it would be sorta dumpy but my husband and I kept saying over and over
Manager Response: Hello Loriegirl,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  This review was outstanding and we really appreciate it.  It looks like you guys really enjoyed the hotel, cleanliness, and the grounds.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Come and stay with us again, and bring the whole family.

Summary Heading: Stayed here for 5 days on a Family vacation.
Summary: We came here in August with 4 kids ranging from 9-20. We had requested the 2 room suite. One room had a king and the other room had 2 beds and a pull out hide a bed in the sitting room. The 2 beds I had thought were queen beds, but they were only doubles. With 3 older kids it was not going to work to share the beds. So, we had to order a roll up cot for the room at an additional cost of $80 for the 5 nights.  The buffet breakfast was great in the mornings. And on most nights they had a theme for a social gathering with food. Enough to fill you up.   They pooled was suppose to be heated but was pretty cold, however, they have quite a large hot tub that was wonderful. We didn't find it until the 4th evening. It is a little hidden out of sight. The pool area is shared with the
Manager Response: Hello Janie D,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  it sounds like the whole family enjoyed the stay with a few glitches.  I apologize that the temperature of the pool wasn't warm enough and that the towels at the bin by the pool were not kept full.  We really would like to have you and your family stay with us again next time you are in town.

Summary: We had booked reservations way in advance for the last week of July. When we arrived at Staybridge Suites, we were greeted by Jimmy who manages the front desk - and yes - he is as professional, helpful and kind as everyone has said on tripadvisor. --In fact, every staff member we came in contact with was great.-- He, Jimmy, told us that our room had sprung a leak and they were overbooked. However, he could get us into the Holiday Inn next door (100 feet away!) and would comp our night. We took the room at the Holiday Inn, were able to check in early and still use the facilities at Staybridge. We had wanted to stay at Staybridge Suites when we were in Anaheim in February but waited too long to book the double room we needed at the time. We will definitely return to Staybridge
Manager Response: Hello Norskie56,  I remember you guys well...  I believe there was a birthday involved that weekend as well.  I first of all want to thank you warmly for the kind words you shared about my service here at the hotel.  And of course, thanks for even taking your time to share your story with us.  I look forward to you and your family coming back to stay with us soon.  Have a great Halloween!

Summary: A short visit to Anaheim to see the Angels ball games and a day at Disneyland.  We checked into the hotel and Pam at the front desk was our 5 star lady.  She went out of her way to get us tickets for the ball games.  She helped out when my son cut his foot while he was out shopping.  People like this really make or break a stay.  Thank you Pam.
Manager Response: Helloteresa o,  Thank you for that wonderful review from your recent stay with us...  and you are right, Pam is fantastic.  It is very nice to have someone on my staff that cares so much.  Thanks for taking your time to share your story with us all.  Please come and stay with us again as soon as possible!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay close to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed in the 2bedroom/2bath suite.  This suite had a king in one room and 2 doubles in the other with a kitchenette and mini living room w/cable tv. It was clean, comfortable, and quiet with a very helpful and friendly staff. Morning breakfasts had multiple choices and they also had evening socials with food that could be a substitute for a light dinner - all included in the price. Definitely will stay here on my next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello galttraveler2016,  Thank you for taking your time to review your recent stay with us.  It sounds like you and your family enjoyed our large comfortable suites, our staff, and our food and beverage options.  It's wonderful to hear you had such a great time.  Please come and stay with us again soon.

Summary: Just spent 6 nights at Staybridge Suites Anaheim. We have used this hotel before, so it is always nice to go back. This trip, ( 9/13/16- 9/18/16) was a good as always. 7 of us in a 2 bedrooms suite. Room was clean and well maintained. We loved the full kitchen! The kids slept on the sofa bed in the living room.  The pool and hot tub are amazing! They make the hotel worth the visit by themselves. The hotel shares the pool with the Holiday Inn next door. The Holiday in is responsible for the pool area. It was frustrating that we had to call for pool towels every time we went to the pool.  No difficulty with check in or check out. All of the staff members were friendly and helpful. Breakfast is hot and tasty. Eggs, bacon or sausage, a waffle maker. Pastry, bagels, toast and cold
Manager Response: Hello beeducky,  Thank you for taking the time to detail a review of your last stay with us.  It looks like you enjoyed your suite, our food and beverage items, our amenities, and our staff.  I also apologize that we did not keep enough pool towels for the flow of guests.  Please come back, bring the family, and stay with us again soon.

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our visit to the Staybridge Suites in Anaheim. Our 2 bedroom suite was spacious and comfortable and a perfect place to relax after a busy day in Disneyland.   The complimentary breakfast was fantastic and had a good variety of food choices. The social evenings were an added bonus and provided free snacks and drinks Monday - Wednesday evenings. The staff were friendly and helpful making our visit easy and stress free!
Manager Response: Hello 7oaks71,  Thank you for taking the time to review your last stay with us.  It looks like you enjoyed the suite, our staff, and our food and beverage options.  We really do try and offer a "stress free" environment here.  Please come and stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Hotel feels new even though it is not - great staff!
Summary: We had just left a old hotel that needed some help and arrived at the Staybridge Suites.  It felt like a new hotel inside and out.  We were greeted warmly and the check-in process was effortless.  They explained the services and amenities, gave us a welcome gift of bonus points, and we were off.  Before going to the room, I picked up a cold glass of cucumber water from the carafe in the lobby - a nice touch.  The common room is large and comfortable.  The 1 bedroom suite (2 double beds) was perfect.  Good size for two people.  We usually like a king bed but this setup was great as we'd be there for a while during my wife's surgical recovery and she needed some space.  My only issue was a loud air conditioner, but the service team jumped on that quickly.  This is not a palace -
Manager Response: Hello Chime141,  Thank you for taking the time to elaborate on the details of your recent stay.  It looks as if you enjoyed the suite, our food and beverage options, and our staff.  We are so glad you and your wife decided to stay with us.  Please come back and stay with us again whenever you are in town.

Summary: We loved the breakfasts and afternoon managers snacks. We used this for our dinner as we had had a large lunch. Suites were well equipped and great for our family. Made our vacation extra special. Being able to use the shuttle saved us in parking at the park. We didn't move our vehicle the whole time we were there.
Manager Response: Hello NanaRuby,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your last visit with us.  It looks like you really enjoyed the food and beverage options that we provide.  Also you enjoyed the comfortable suites and the accessibility without having to use your car, kudos! We are very glad we could be a part of your family's vacation.  Please come back and stay with us again soon.

Summary: Stayed at the Staybridge Suites Anaheim for a few days the end of August and had the best time. First of all, the moment we walked into the hotel we were greeted by Jimmy and Peter at the front desk who were both fabulous, attentive, knowledgeable, and 100% customer oriented. Thank you, both! Our suite was super clean and comfortable. Absolutely NO black feet after walking on the floor/carpet at all, so major points in that respect! We didn't hear any noise at all, either from the outside or from other rooms. The breakfast buffet was nice, yet crowded, but for our needs we simply had fresh fruit and a bagel and took the food back to our suite. The social hour was a fab touch! Very nice indeed! We didn't go the first night we arrived, but did the second night for the nacho bar
Manager Response: Hello englishyankee1,  Thank you very much for the ringing endorsement.  It was so nice, I read it twice and printed a copy to hang in the office.  Also, a special thanks for noting Peter and myself, at check it.  We really appreciate the acknowledgement.  It looks like you really enjoyed yourselves and your pet, and we look forward to seeing you again soon for that trip to Universal coming up at the end of the year.  So, we will see you again soon, and have a great day!

Summary: It has been The second time I have been in this hotel because The first time Was a great experience in everything. Not this time. The hotel is very comfortable and convenience with his three time in a week of light dinner and a very good breakfast buffet.  Bad recepitonist because like The first time  I booked a vacation pakage with Disney that is all inclusive: Parks tickets, transportations tickets an dome complimentary  Disney gadgets. At check-in The lady at The desk wasen't friendly and too much fast to check me in sending me and my family in to The room. Room Spacious and clean. But The lady at The desk didn't vive me all The Disney tickets and trasportati on tickets. I cane back asking her if she has forgot them but she answered me that I needed to buy them and she can
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review Gabriele. Just as you, I am disappointed to hear that your second stay with us did not go as it should have. Please know that we take pride in ensuring all our guest feel welcomed and all their needs are met and exceeded.   According to your review, we dropped the ball. For this I apologize. I will be addressing this with the team and continue to work with them on situations such as these.   I hope you will allow us the opportunity to provide you with the service we know we can and do offer all our guests. Please feel free to contact me directly if you would like to discuss this matter further. We appreciate your choice to stay with us when you are in Anaheim and look forward to your next stay.   Kindest Regards, Paula Kilmaster Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Basically good but not without problems
Summary: The hotel was good and rooms well laid out, and main bed comfortable. Sadly the sofa bed was lumpy and very uncomfortable and the rooms were also badly insulated against noise. Breakfast was horrific and staff really rude and unhelpful, tables were not wiped for the whole sitting and if time was up then lights were turned out in the room even if people were still cooking waffles. Housekeeping and front desk staff were however lovely.  Sort out the windows to keep noise, new matresses for the sofa beds and fire the morons who ran breakfast and get good staff and this place could easily be a 5!
Manager Response: Dear Lee B,  Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to write us a review. I am glad to know that you have regarded our rooms to nice and bed comfortable. However, we regret that the condition of the sofa bed, breakfast staff were a letdown. We have taken note of your comments and have shared them with our management team to review the procedures we have in place and make necessary improvements to our service to ensure guests do not experience this in the future.   Once again, thank you for staying with us and we all hope to have an opportunity to serve you again on your next future visit.  Sincerely,    Dianne L  Case Manager  IHGService

Summary: We stayed for five nights. We arrived way before check in time but were quickly accommodated and upgraded. The pool area is very nice, breakfast was good and rooms was huge. All the people who work there are very nice and very customer focused and friendly. We will be back.

We arrived a bit early to check in they were nice enough to pre register us and gave us a call when our room was ready. Very nice hotel family friendly plus they sell Disney tickets there saves you the hassle at the park. Only thing that I can complain about is the really hard uncomfortable sofa mattress couldn't even use it!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am thrilled to know we were able to pre register you and your family and call you once your room was ready. The convenience of being a Disney "Good Neighbor" Hotel allows us the opportunity to offer our guests the quickest and easiest way to purchase tickets to the parks and shuttle services as well. I am glad you were able to take advantage of these services.   I apologize for the inconvenience of our sofa mattress. We pride ourselves in ensuring all our guests are comfortable and feel like they are home when staying with us. I will definitely pass on your comment regarding the comfort level to the management team.   We look forward to you and your family's next visit to our hotel.

Summary Heading: The people will bring us back.
Summary: This is a typical Staybridge Suites, but the pool area is better.  Pam at the front desk, and Chris from maintenance are the reasons we will return.  Great people, great service, and an asset to anyone's vacation.
Manager Response: Hello Kirk B,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  It sounds like you guys had a great stay...  thanks for the part about "an asset to anyone's vacation", that recommendation is awesome.  Also a big thanks for your recognition of Pam and Chris.  Both are assets here and I appreciate you noticing them.  Have a great day and please come back soon!

Summary: We travel to this area several times per year and have found our go-to hotel. The rate was excellent. The employees were great. Cleanliness was fabulous. Amenities were perfect. We just had two very small issues.  When we ran out of shampoo, housekeeping brought two conditioners and no shampoo. When we asked for additional, there was no problem. The second time we ran out of shampoo, we were given two conditioners and a lotion. Again - not a problem, just odd.  The one thing that was slightly troublesome occurred one night. Our family woke up to a very, very strong flowery/chemical smell. It was so strong that it was actually difficult to breathe for some of us. We checked all over the room but couldn't find the source. Once we opened the room door, the smell was overwhelming.
Manager Response: Hello Luve2Travel35,  Thank you very much for the very detailed review of your last stay with us.  It sounds like mostly, everything was fine.  I appreciate the feedback.  It is through great feedback like this that we can improve our services and hotel.  It does concern me that you had to deal with the smell of the carpet shampooing, leading you to have to open the windows to get fresh air; I apologize completely.  Please give me a call if you wanted to talk about the issues directly at 714/748-7700, Jimmy Raynor- Front Office Manager.  Thank you and please come and stay with us again soon.

Summary: Always stay here when our family is in Anaheim. Suites are alway clean and well kept. Hot breakfast every morning and a meal three evenings a week make for a great value. The pool and hot tub are great for a midday break from the theme parks and a great place to unwind at the end of the day. Great location on the Anaheim Resort Transit (ART) route to shuttle you back and forth from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Dwayne P,  Thank you for taking the time to detail your recent stay with us.  It looks like you enjoyed everything.  Thanks for mentioning the great buffet breakfast, pool and hot tube, and our location.  We hope you will stay with us whenever you come into town.

Summary Heading: Some of our families first time to California
Summary: We loved this hotel - they were extremely kind and helpful. You can get your tickets for the shuttle there and for the park too. The breakfast is really great - sausage one day and bacon the next. The rooms with the kitchens are great! The pool was very nice - so  much our kids (which we have a couple of adults) wanted to stay back while us parents went to the park so they could lay around and swim for the day. The staff is very friendly and they have a nice laundry room next to the workout room. We stayed on the top floor away from any noise but could look out the hall windows and see the fireworks. The shuttle is nice but get there early or you could have to wait if it is too full. It wouldn't be easy to walk, so take the shuttle but our stop is for both hotels and there is
Manager Response: Hello Sharynn M,  Thank you for detailing a review of your last stay with us.  It sounds like you and the kids had a great time.  Thank you for all of the kind words about the hotel and services.  Thanks especially for the great comments about our staff; we really appreciate it.  Please come and stay with us again soon.

Summary: We stayed at the hotel for one night. The suite is very well designed and very comfortable. We chose the first floor because our dog was with us. It is a dog friendly hotel. Parking was ample and free. In the morning we had an overflown sink and I called the front desk, After a few attempts, we were told that the problem was bigger than anticipated and needed more time. The Hotel manager came to our room, offered us a new room to shower and get ready and told us not to worry about the check out time. And as we were checking out, he waived the nightly charge all together! Amazing.
Manager Response: Hello Ida and Gabriel A,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  Thank you for all of the nice comments and thanks for understanding about the plumbing issue.  It was my pleasure to help you that day, as it will be my pleasure to help you in the future.  I hope we see you again soon.  Please come back and stay with us whenever you are in town.

Summary: This is a pretty busy hotel as it is very near Disney. As such it has a high turnover of people. That said the girls on the front desk were great. Also the hotel really tries hard to keep people onside - "social nights" with free food and beer a great idea. Breakfast is busy. Rooms are fine for purpose. A minor grumble as a driver is that it's one way on S Manchester so popping out requires a longer trip out and usually quick trip back. I'd go back.
Manager Response: Hello Hockeyboy,  Thank you for taking the time to recap your recent stay with us.  It looks like you really enjoyed the location, the evening socials, and our front desk staff.  We appreciate the feedback.  Please come and stay with us whenever you are in the area.

Summary: This was a decent place to stay with the family on a Disneyland trip. The hotel is showing signs of wear but is being maintained. The front desk staff are friendly & helpful. The breakfast is a good buffet with a reasonable selection of fruit, cereal, waffles, coffee etc etc. The suites are a good size and accommodated the 2 adults & 2 children (9 and 5 yrs) well. The washroom was showing its age.  There was a shuttle from the neighboring holiday inn (just a minute walk away) to Disneyland park every 20 minutes on the hour. Sometimes this ended up being a 30 minute wait between shuttles $14/day for the 4 of us. Disneyland park is a 10 minute bus ride from the hotel.  In summary: a safe & reasonable place to stay when visiting Disneyland. Not flash, but still OK.
Manager Response: Hello NEEMAM,  Thank you for the detailed review of your recent stay with us.  It looks like you  enjoyed most of the hotel including the breakfast and the ART shuttle.  Thanks also for the feedback on where we can improve.  Please come and stay with us again whenever you are in town.

Summary Heading: On balance, I would not go back
Summary: Our family recently stayed here for four nights while visiting Disney.  On balance, I cannot recommend it despite the generally good reviews from others.  I was hoping for much better but left disappointed.  Here are some thoughts that I think management should pay attention to:  1. The general state of the place is tired.  It's dark, old, or in disrepair in many areas both in the room and in common spaces.  For example, the elevators are dirty and damaged inside.  It's the sort of thing that lets one know that management doesn't care enough about the property to keep it up to a high standard.   2. Our room was small (we had the 2 bedroom/2 bath "suite") and the furniture left something to be desired.  They tried to update the kitchens and they are fine but other things are
Manager Response: Hello SPurkey,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at our hotel.  I apologize that things were not up to par for your stay.  I also appreciate the feedback so as that we can improve our hotel and services.  Have a great day.

Summary Heading: Pam on the front desk is AWESOME!
Summary: Stayed here for a week in July.  Clean, comfortable, good breakfast and GOOD individually ground cups of coffee.  They let us check in early which really helped with our schedule so we could have room in the car to pick up airport friends. Kitchen in the suite was such a bonus. Pam at the front desk was amazing - so friendly, accommodating and went out of here way to make our stay extra pleasant. We requested a quiet room and she gave us a nice, quiet corner spot.  We have stayed other places around Disney that we would not recommend - We would definitely stay here again and would recommend it!
Manager Response: Hello 3-in-the-treetops,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  It looks like you enjoyed the hotel, our breakfast, and especially our Pam.  Thanks especially for recognizing our employee efforts and for the recommendations to friends and family.  Please come and stay with us again soon!

Summary: First time staying at a Staybridge. My needs were met 100%. We flew into LAX at 9 am, with two tired kids. I called ahead of time to see if we could get a early check in and they had me come straight to them and got us in to our room right away that early afternoon. First off, the room was amazing. So clean. We had a queen studio suite and that was perfect for our Family of 4. With the pull our couch. Loved being able to have their nightly social, we were very tired from traveling and the little bit of exploring we did so we stayed behind to swim and have taco bar and beer. The hot breakfast, fantastic. The service, amazing. I wouldn't recommend walking to Disney unless you wanted to save the money. It felt long to me. But it is do able still. Plenty of restaurants nearby. I am
Manager Response: Hello nikki H,  Wow!  What a great review.  Thank you so much for the great details and kind words about our hotel and brand.  I really hope your stay at the Staybridge in Oklahoma is just as great as ours.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: First of all I would like to say that last year we stayed on the Disney property and had an amazing experience. Staying at Disney is ideal, however, expensive. This year we opted to stay at the Staybridge instead. Over all, it was very nice. We accommodated 3 kids and 4 adults in a large suite. We paid about $225 a night. That same room would have been around $700 at a Disney hotel. This hotel has just been remodeled. The rooms were clean and well stocked. It was nice to have a full kitchen to cook meals. Again, saving money by cooking dinners. The breakfast is free every morning. Expect free food to be horrible. The buffet is hardly edible to anyone who is used to eating a homemade breakfast. If you stick to the waffles and fresh fruit you will be ok. There is a shuttle service
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for the detailed review of your last stay with us.  It really sound like you enjoyed the value of the hotel the most.  We are glad you and your family had a great stay and we hope you will come and stay with us again soon.

Summary: Stayed here for three-nights during a recent trip to Disneyland.  The hotel seemed like it was renovated in the past couple years but it’s already showing it’s wear and tear, especially with the furnishings in the room.  We had a queen studio and had everything we needed.  Our family travelling with us had a two bedroom suite, with one king and two doubles, with each bedroom having it's own bathroom.  Definitely a great choice for families.  One thing to note is that their housekeeping service is not full service, but was efficient enough for us as they just made the bed, replaced towels, and emptied the trash.  Breakfast is served daily and they had an adequate offering, typically of any complimentary breakfast, including hot and cold items.  My favorite was their coffee
Manager Response: Hello norcalnick,  Thank you for taking the time to make a detailed review of your recent stay with us.  It looks like you and your family had a good time.  Thanks for pointing out some of our best services; a special BIG THANKS for the very kind words about the front office staff.  And thanks for the feedback on where we can improve.  Please have a great day and come and stay with us again soon.

Summary: We had a 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom suite for the 6 of us on the 6th floor with a view of the pool.  (Although we weren’t able to try out the pool.)  We were able to see the fireworks from the room.  The room consisted of:    4 adults, 1 teen, and 1 child.   The side with 2 Queen beds had a shower and the side with the King Bed had a Tub/Shower.  In between both rooms was the kitchen and living room with the pull out couch.  The teen does NOT recommend the pull out couch, he said it was really hard and not very comfortable.  So he pretty much just slept on the couch and didn’t pull it out except for the one night he tried it.  I really liked that there were dressers in both bedrooms and in the living room.  So with the closet, we had ample space for all of our clothes.  In the closet
Manager Response: Hello midori_puppy,  Thank you for giving such a detailed review of your recent stay with us.  It looks like you and your family had a pretty great time staying with us.  Please come and stay with us again soon!

Summary: We always stay here when visiting Disneyland! They have wonderful 2 bedroom suites w a kitchen and dining area, living area, king bedroom and a 2 queen bedroom each w their own full bath. TVs in every room keep all family members happy.The free breakfasts are bountiful and delicious. You can catch the bus to Disney right next door where they also have a nice casual restaurant. Always very clean with friendly helpful staff. Many smaller suites and rooms also available. Have fun!!!
Manager Response: Hello pattywest13,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  I thank you so much for the wonderful comments and the kind words about our staff.  It looks like you and your family really enjoyed your stay, as usual.  Please come and stay with us again as soon as possible.  Have a great day!

Summary: I definitely recommend this hotel to anyone thinking of going to Anaheim. The breakfast was excellent, they also had a light dinner Monday-Wednesday. Friendly staff, the rooms were so nice! The pool was awesome, all around great experience I won't stay anywhere else!
Manager Response: Hello Chelsae A,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  Thank you very much for all of the kind words; especially about our staff.  And we also appreciate the recommendations.  We hope you will come and stay with us again soon!

Summary: We recently stayed here for a visit to Disneyland.  Myself, my husband and our 13.5 YO son.  This is a very clean and well maintained hotel.  Super responsive on the maintenance as well.  One morning I got up early to use the bathroom and as the door was shutting (I'm trying not to wake everyone!) it had a super loud groaning noise.  I called the front desk and thry asked me what time I would like someone to come by.  When I got back from the pool, there was a business card from Doug stating he had come and fixed the door.  Sure enough it was!  Very appreciative. Pool area is large and very attractive.  I spent a lot of time out there when I wasn't at Disneyland with the family. We purchased an ART pass through our Costco vacation package and it was very convenient catching the
Manager Response: Hello Rachel C,  Thank you for taking the time to make a detailed recap of your recent stay with us.  It looks like you enjoyed most of everything, but obviously, we have a little room to grow and be better, and be "greener".  Please come and stay with us again whenever you are in town and thanks for the recommendation to friends.  Have a great day.

Summary Heading: Very good and excellent for families
Summary: The is a very good hotels for families visiting California. The location is right between Disneyland and Angels stadium. Right by the freeway so you can be ANYWHERE in the L A area in an hour. Good pool for the kids and breakfast is definitely a money savor. Only suggestion I would have is that the pool bar does not open until 4 (which is 6 or 7 by the body clock to most) and might want to open earlier as there more adults out by pool afternoon. We had a 2 bedroom suite that had plenty of room and could relax in the living room as a family before going to bed. The staff is very friendly but I can't tell you if they can handle any issues because there were NO ISSUES!!!! LOL. The Godfather
Manager Response: Hello Jim A,  Thank you very much for detailing your recent stay with us.  I am very glad you and your family enjoyed the hotel, our location, the breakfast, and our staff.  Thanks especially for the kind comments about the staff.  We would love you guys to come and stay with us again soon.  And for the Godfather...  This is an offer you cannot refuse...  lol  See you again soon!

Summary Heading: Friendly hotel, Suites well equipped and spacious
Summary: The location of the stay bridge suites is a bit out of the way but there is a shuttle bus that you can use which is very reasonably priced. Our room was very nice spacious with a separate lounge/kitchen area. Bathroom is small but adequate. The staff are very friendly and helpful and the complimentary breakfast each morning is very good free coffee is available 24/7. Free wifi was excellent . Great pool area and free parking. I would advise bringing groceries with you if you plan to eat in as there is no food outlet nearby to stock up. Only surprising thing was there was no safe in the room.
Manager Response: Hello Wendy221,  Thank you very much for the detailed recap of your stay with us.  It sounds like you really enjoyed the spacious suites, our staff, and our breakfast.  Thanks so much for staying with us and please come and stay again soon.

Summary: Thank you guys at the Staybridge.    A perfect suite to stay and fulfill the Disney adventure experience.   We loved the suite you gave us and were so happy with your help in looking after all our bags and the late checkout !!!     A great swimming pool and relax area too,  and as Australian's I loved that you have  a free to use BBQ in this downstairs area !    Our daughter was absolutely wrapped in her Minney Mouse gifts that you left her !!! Well done and thanks guys,   Kath, David and Jazzy
Manager Response: Hello Kath086,  Thank you very much for all of the lovely words and comments.  We are thrilled that you and the whole family enjoyed your time here.  As a staff, we are always happy to help a wonderful family such as yourselves.  Please come back and stay with us whenever you are in the states.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a family
Summary: As with most visitors to this hotel, we stayed here for our trip to Disneyland. This is a terrific hotel. We stayed in a 2 bedroom which is comfortable for two adult couples, or families with up to 3 or 4 kids, depending upon their ages. There is a small kitchen where you could do some very lite cooking. Full refrigerator. There is a dinner service Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday. The food is perfectly fine, all included with your stay. The breakfast is also a good deal. The pool was terrific, as was the spa. Also, if you need wheelchair access, this hotel is great. They have set the breakfast area up in such a way to be able to easily accommodate wheelchairs. The bus stop for Disneyland is right across the parking lot, so it is very convenient. Of course, you need to expect
Manager Response: Hello wardgarner,  Thank you for taking the time to detail your review of your recent stay with us.  It looks like you really enjoyed the spacious suites, the ART shuttle, and our pool and breakfast.  We are very glad you and your family had a great time.  Please come back and stay whenever you are in town.

Summary Heading: Excellent home base for your Disney adventure
Summary: Let's face it. When you are in this part of the world, it's generally all Disneyland. So your accommodation really is just a means to an end.    You need breakfast in the morning to fuel up for a big day out, then a way to get to and from the theme park (regular bus that comes about every half hour and then takes about 15 minutes to get to the Park entry) and then a comfortable bed when you return.  And this is what you get at Staybridge. Spacious rooms, a nice pool and spa to ease the tired feet and body, full cooking facilities (there's not much in the way of restaurants in the immediate area, if that's what you are looking for - we were happy to cook some pasta and chop up some salad).  If you're all Disneyed out, you can get a bus to pick you up for all sorts of other tours
Manager Response: Hello tbt1964,  Thank you for really taking the time to detail your recent stay with us.  It sounds like you really liked the hotel, our spacious suites, and our amenities.  Thanks again for all the kind words.  Please come and stay with us again soon!

Summary: I stayed here with friends and the suite was nice. Plenty of room with two bedrooms,and a fold-out couch, comfortable beds, clean and well stocked kitchen. The staff was very friendly and helpful. A small maintenance problem was quickly taken care of. It is also a quick hop to Disneyland by car or there is a shuttle next door.
Manager Response: Hello rmkahn,  Thank you for taking the time to review your last stay with us.  It looks like you  guys really enjoyed the suite, our hotel, and our staff.  Thanks also for mentioning the quick response by our maintenance staff.  Please come and stay with us again whenever you are in town.

Summary: Visited based on the many positive reviews. Very, very small rooms based on the suites that we are used to. Room condition was a slight upgrade from a motel and the towels and bedding were very dingy. Furniture could use some upholstering and the rooms could really use some airing out and vent/duct cleaning. The lobby and pool area were very nice however and we really enjoyed the breakfast and evening reception where everyone got together and socialized which made it feel like a B&B.  It would be helpful if staff served some of the evening reception food as many guest were piling food onto plates (for the entire week it appeared) which made food run out faster and once it was gone, it was not replenished. The front desk staff were friendly and very helpful.
Manager Response: Hollo Joy576,  Thank you for the review of your last stay with us.  I apologize that we did not meet your expectations on this stay.  We will you this feedback to try and make positive improvements to our service.  Also thank you for the kind words about our front desk staff.

Summary Heading: Good option for families who like to self cater
Summary: It's nothing flash but the best part about this hotel is you can get 1 or 2 bedroom apartments to spread out and not feel so cramped compared to an all in 1 hotel room. there is also a kitchenette with stovetop to self-cater. Pool area is nice and staff were friendly.
Manager Response: Hello adamfromtheshire,  Thank you for taking a little time to review our hotel and staff.  It sounds like you enjoyed the space of the suites, our services, and our staff.  Please come and stay with us again soon.

Summary: Positives: Kitchen, evening snacks, free wine and beer, nice staff  Negatives:  Poor maintenance.  Half of the things do not work.  They recently went into 6 months of renovation.  However, nothing much changed.  Fitness center looks like, any machine can fall of any moment. Bathrooms are dirty and unmaintained.  Room service is not that great. I have stayed for almost a month here, but finally moved out.  They claim to be equivalent to Residence Inn for mariott.  However, nowhere near them.  They are more close to Extended Stay with kitchen.  In addition, this is highly pricy
Manager Response: Hello Rohit S.,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  I apologize that you did no have a great stay with us.  The feedback is appreciated.  Have a great day.

Summary: You cannot beat great free breakfast (daily) AND happy hour (3x week) a quick shuttle ride to Disney; with plenty of room to stretch out and a kitchen in the room. Nice pool too, and friendly staff. We will be back.
Manager Response: Hello Irreverin,  Thank you for taking a little time to review our hotel.  It sounds like you enjoyed the food options, ART shuttle, and our hotel in general.  Please come and stay with us again whenever you are in town.

Summary: have just spent 10 days at this hotel and again is was worth while booking here again. It was 4 years since our last stay and it was pleasing to see some of the staff who we had talked to on our previous stay still there. We mentioned to one of the staff who had been there before about an incident about our granddaughter birthday which was whilst we were there last time and supprise supprise  when we came back after a day at Disneyland there was a Happy birthday not on the door for our granddaughter including her name ( who was not with us) on this trip. Whilst this hotel is not alongside Disneyland transport by public bus is not a problem and very hand 2 minutes walk.
Manager Response: Hello nojo2014,  Thank you for taking some time to detail a review of your recent stay with us.  It is great to see returning guests.  It sounds like you really enjoy the hotel, the staff, and services.  We are so happy to have the opportunity to take care of you and your family again.  Please come and stay with us again soon.

Summary: Stayed here four nights in the two bedroom suite. Plenty of space for our family of 5 plus 2 grandparents. Newly renovated interiors. Clean, comfortable, with great amenities, including outdoor heated pool and hot tub plus free hot breakfast every morning. Some weeknights they offer a basic free hot dinner, as well. Great for those trying to save on eating out! Staff was accommodating with room change, adding a crib, and helpful with directions to local stores. Free parking. We rented a car and drove to Disney each day. It's a little far to walk and it ended up being cheaper for us to rent a car than to pay for the shuttle to Disney, which picks up next door at the Holiday Inn. Cons: rooms do not have individual a/c units. It wasn't a problem for the time of year we stayed, but
Manager Response: Hello Olivia H,  Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your recent stay with us.  Thanks also for all the kind words about the staff, our hotel, and our services.  We  really appreciate the feedback.  Please come and stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: We like the place but few flaws
Summary: We just got back from staying here again.  We've stayed here a handful of times. We like the place but there were a few flaws that wasn't addressed. Things we love are pool, BBQ grilles, breakfast area and big rooms.  This time our room had some issues.  Towels were old.  The bathroom drain was clogged.  I told the front desk on our way out but it wasn't taken care of.  We also called about the sheets needed to be changed as one was stained and the blanket for the sofe sleeper was really worn out.  Holes and torn as I have posted a few pictures of it.  they changed the sheets but didn't replace the blanket and I left it out with a note on it.  I'm not sure why someone would fold it up after wash put back to go for use in a room.  The area is quiet, closed to freeway. We usually
Manager Response: Hello Fredrock,  Thank you for the detailed review of your recent stay with us.  Thank you for all the kind words about loving the hotel and amenities.  And I apologize for the areas where which, we let you down.  I will speak to the Housekeeping and Maintenance about the linen and drain issues, we appreciate the feedback.  Please come back and stay with us again soon.

Summary: The hotel was clean.  We had the king suite for 7 people.  Breakfast was great and the appetizers offered in the evenings were tasty.  We were going to Disneyland.  We were able to pick up a shuttle right next to the hotel (this wasn't included in the hotel package but was reasonably priced).  The kids swam in the heated pool every night.  Towels were provided and plenty of patio chairs and loungers.  We felt like you got a lot for the money.
Manager Response: Hello Sweetooth66,  Thank you for taking the time to review your last stay with us.  It sounds like you guys had a great time.  It looks like you enjoyed our food options, our service and facilities, and our value.  Please come back and stay with us again soon.

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised with this hotel. Unfortunately, most hotels in the Disneyland area feel they can charge an arm and a leg for a room, and people will pay it (and they do) simply because it is near Disney. I read a ton of reviews, and decided to take the chance, as most reviews of the Staybridge were good. I am so happy I did!!  The hotel had recently been renovated. The rooms were very modern and nice. There was a small kitchenette with a fridge, dishwasher, microwave, 2 burner oven and sink. Even dishes. A small sitting area with a sleeper sofa. For us, the bed was very comfy. Super soft pillows, so if you like firmer, be sure to pack your own :)  The room was very clean, and light cleaning is done daily (towel replacement, trash pickup, and bed making) if you stay
Manager Response: Hello Stellar81,  Thank you for taking the time to create a detailed review of your recent stay with us.  It sounds like you and your family had a great stay with us.  It looks like you enjoyed the suite and housekeeping services, the location, and our staff.  Thanks also for commenting on the areas where we can improve.  We hope you and your family will come and stay with us again soon.

Summary: We recently had a family holiday to California and the Staybridge Suites were wonderful.  Perfect location for a short walk or ride to all attractions, theme parks, sports arenas, shops, cheesecake factory and the staff could not be more helpful. Anything we needed or any information we were looking for the staff went out their way to help. The rooms were great, beds were comfortable. With the windows closed you could not hear any noise from the freeway at all. We would definitely book here again if we ever have the chance of going back to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Hello Eugene_McT,  Thank you for taking the time to review your most recent stay with us.  It sounds like you really enjoyed the hotel and services, our staff, and our location.  We are very happy you and your family had a great stay.  Please come back and stay with us again whenever you are in town.

Summary: nice property. clean pool with outside food service. daily breakfast at no additional charges. free parking, free wifi and during the week they were serving a hamburger / hotdogs early dinner for free with beer , wine, sodas. they also did a nacho night while we were there. Rooms clean, updated. lots of room for familys with a kitchenette. you can catch a.r.t. to Disneyland next door at the holiday inn for a 5.00 all day ticket back and forth to park. Runs every 20 min. My son did find glass on the floor in his room after he stepped on it and cut his foot. Just a small cut though. everything turned out ok. rooms clean. laundry room on site as well as a gym
Manager Response: Hello lopezhollister,  Thank you for giving a detailed review of your recent stay with us.  It looks like you guys enjoyed our hotel, our food options, and services.  I apologize that your son hurt himself in the suite, and hope he is doing well.  Please come and stay with us again the next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Top hotel would definitely stay here again
Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights and would rank as one of the best value hotels I've stayed in. Facilities are superb and the rooms spacious and comfortable. Good complimentary breakfast and whilst we were there had complimentary snacks and drink early evening on a Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday. Good location with a regular bus shuttle to Disney ($5). Not much within walking distance but there is a lot within a 5 - 10 minute drive. Can't really fault anything about the hotel, had everything we wanted and more.
Manager Response: Hello Andrew W.,  Thank you for taking your time to write a detailed review of your recent stay with us.  It looks like you really enjoyed our value, our hotel and services, and our location.  We appreciate the feedback and hope you and your family will come and stay with us again next time you are in town.  Have a great day.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a Disneyland vacation adventure
Summary: Wonderful hotel with helpful friendly staff and many extra features to make spending the day at theme parks even more enjoyable.  From the complete breakfast in the morning to the evening snacks and barbecues including wine and beer. Clean rooms with mini kitchens to full on suites. Pool and spa add a nice touch too.  We will return.
Manager Response: Hello masjack,  Thank you for taking a few minutes to review your last stay at our hotel.  It looks like you enjoyed our staff, our food options, and the size of our suites.  We appreciate that you also liked our housekeeping services and facilities.  Please come and stay with us again soon.

Summary: We stayed in the two bedroom suite which had two separate bedrooms with a pullout bed in a living room in between. The kitchen was small and only had a small selection of pans and dishes. The kitchen had a two burner stove, apartment sized fridge, dishwasher and microwave. The one thing thing I found a little odd was only have two chairs at the table in the kitchen, especially since the suite was designed to have up to 8 guests. I would have expected at least 4 chairs. It made it a little difficult to eat in the room. I saw many families eating their food in the breakfast area near the lobby so I guessed we weren't the only ones having a hard time eating in the room. The breakfast was one of the best I have seen at a hotel and we also liked the barbecues on the premises that
Manager Response: Hello Laura M,  Thank you for taking lots of time to detail a review of your recent stay with us.
